The short animation shows people smiling as the unpopular king gives his seal of approval. Around 20 copies of the Magna Carta were made at the time but just four remain today. The historic momenttook place on June 15 1215.

Article.title: Britain’s youngest suicide bomber was ‘a loving, kind and caring’ teenager
Article.Description: His family said those who sent him to his death had preyed on his 'innocence and vulnerability'.
Article.MainBody: Ollie McAteer for Metro.co.uk Monday 15 Jun 2015 8:29 am Talha Asmal from Yorkshire is Britains youngest suicide bomber The family of a teenager believed to be Britains youngest suicide bomber said they have been left utterly devastated and heartbroken by the unspeakable tragedy of his death. Talha Asmal, 17, who reportedly detonated a vehicle fitted with explosives while fighting for Isis in Iraq, has been described as a loving, kind, caring and affable teenager. But in a statement, his family said those who sent himto his death had preyed on his innocence and vulnerability. The teenager fled his home in Dewsbury, West Yorkshire, in March to allegedly join Isis along with his friend Hassan Munshi, who was also 17. They said despite him never exhibiting any extreme or radical views, he had been exploited by extremists on the internet. Unbeknown to them and completely against their will, they said he travelled to Iraq via Turkey and fell under the spell of Isis handlers. The family said: We are all naturally utterly devastated and heartbroken by the unspeakable tragedy that now appears to have befallen us. The 17-year-old has been described as loving and caring (Picture: PA) We need time and understanding to come to terms with our unimaginable and painful loss. As a family we would like to take this opportunity to unequivocally state that Isis are not Islam. They do not represent in any way, shape or form Islam and Muslims and we are no longer prepared to allow a barbaric group like Isis to hijack our faith.Isis not and never in our name. West Yorkshire Police said they were unable to confirm the identity of the person who had died but were continuing to support families who have loved ones that are believed to have travelled to Iraq and Syria. MORE: Islamic State fighters execute at least 400 people mostly women and children Assistant Chief Constable Russ Foster said people who travel to Syria and parts of Iraq are likely to witness extreme violence and could become victims of violence themselves. He said: As part of the Prevent initiative West Yorkshire Police is committed to working with communities and local authorities, to highlight the dangers associated with radicalisation and travel to regions such as Syria and Iraq. We are all working together to help identify vulnerable members of our society and intervene and engage them before it is too late. If anyone has concerns that a friend or relative may be vulnerable to radicalisation, expressing extreme views or contemplating travelling to Syria or Iraq, it is vital that we work together to try and prevent that person from travelling. More

Article.title: Two teenagers lose limbs in separate shark attacks
Article.Description: A 12-year-old girl is believed to have lost part of her arm and could lose a leg.
Article.MainBody: Ollie McAteer for Metro.co.uk Monday 15 Jun 2015 7:53 am One victim is believed to be a 13-year-old girl(Picture: Steve Bouser/The Pilot, Southern Pines, N.C. via AP) Two teenagers have suffered serious injuries after they were badly mauled in separate shark attacks. One victim, believed to bea12-year-old girl, had her arm amputatedand could lose her leg following the attack off Oak Island, North Carolina, US, on Sunday. Beach-goers rushed to her aid after hearing screams from the water. She was flownto a hospital in Wilmington where her arm was removed at the elbow. Around an hour later a 16-year-old boy was bitten by a shark just two miles along the same stretch and is believed to have lost a limb as well. Large bite marks are seen in a boogie board after the attack (Picture: abc news) He suffered serious injuries to an arm, which could be lost, according to the mayor, Betty Wallace. Video footage from local TV stations shows a boogie board with large chunks taken out of it. Town officials are meeting todayto decide whether to officially close the beach to the public. Mayor Betty Wallacesaid: I dont want everybody to think this is one of those areas where you really have to worry about shark bites.But for the foreseeable future, people have to be extra vigilant. Around 90 minutes later another teenager was attacked in waters just two miles away (Picture: Steve Bouser/The Pilot, Southern Pines, N.C. via AP)

Article.title: Woman jailed for failing to return Monster-In-law VHS tape rented in 2005
Article.Description: Monster-In-Law was collecting dust for a decade.
Article.MainBody: Ollie McAteer for Metro.co.uk Monday 15 Jun 2015 7:19 am Monster-In-Law was collecting dust in her home for a decade (Picture: Getty) A woman has been jailed for failing to return a video she rented in 2005. Kayla Michelle Finley, of South Carolina, US, had VHS tape Monster-In-Law sitting in her home for a decade. She rented theJennifer Lopez movie from Dalton Videos now out of business. Finley, 27, was at a police station on another matter when officers unearthed an arrest warrant for her, CNN reports . The stores owner had even contacted the police in a bid to get her to return it. She was arrested on a misdemeanor charge of failure to return the videoand spent a night in jail because her hearing could not be held until the following day. CNN quote Finley as saying: Im no criminal, but Pickens County Sheriffs office sure made me feel like I was.

Article.title: Twitter can’t stop laughing at Jeb Bush’s presidential campaign logo
Article.Description: JEB! JEB! JEB! JEB! JEB! JEB!
Article.MainBody: Nicholas Reilly for Metro.co.uk Sunday 14 Jun 2015 8:20 pm (Picture: Twitter/ Jeb Bush) If youre running to become president of the United States, its pretty important to deliver a campaign thats filled with authority, power and conviction. But try telling that to Jeb Bush, after the Republican hopeful unveiled this logo for his campaign complete with a weirdly placed exclamation mark. It certainly doesnt look like the hallmark of a man whos trying to get into the Oval Office, but instead comes across like some kind of short-lived domestic sitcom from the 1980s. Apparently, hes used the logo for all his political activities since 1994, but that doesnt make it any less shouty and overly familiar. JEB! (Picture: AP Photo/Paul Sancya) JEB! it screams at you, while being burned into your cerebral cortex. Twitter had a few ideas about what it resembled, too. Opening on Broadway in 2016 Is Jeb Bush running for president or advertising his autobiographical musical? pic.twitter.com/iTVM2LUJmW The Rude Pundit (@rudepundit) June 14, 2015 Hes got a point yknow The important thing about the Jeb logo isnt the exclamation point that is there. Its the last name that isnt there. David Frum (@davidfrum) June 14, 2015 Heard the one about the invasion-loving brother? Jeb Bush either running for president or doing an 80's style improv special pic.twitter.com/cHefncXhEe Desus Nice (@desusnice) June 14, 2015 SHOUT IT FROM THE ROOFTOPS This is actually making me want to run around the streets shouting 'JEB!' and random passerbys. https://t.co/7rCvwYztaH Marie Le Conte (@youngvulgarian) June 14, 2015 Wed watch it This looks like a teaser image for a sitcom about a man named Jeb who moves 2 the big city after years on the ranch. https://t.co/plaRqpOhHm Willoughby B. Dobbs (@WilloughbyDobbs) June 14, 2015 But if the whole presidential thing doesnt work out, it looks like a career as a masseuse awaits More

Article.title: Billionaire Cartier boss is kept ‘awake at night’ by the thought of the poor rising up
Article.Description: Spare a thought...
Article.MainBody: Nicholas Reilly for Metro.co.uk Sunday 14 Jun 2015 2:29 pm (Picture: Reuters) Spare a thought for the billionaire owner of jewellery company Cartier, who has revealed that hes kept awake at night by the thought of the poor rising up to overthrow the rich. Pretty terrifying stuff, right? Johann Rupert, whos worth an estimated $7.5 (4.8) billion, reportedly made the comments at a Financial Times summit in the billionaires playground of Monaco. How is society going to cope with structural unemployment and the envy, hatred and the social welfare? he said. We are destroying the middle classes at this stage and it will affect us. Its unfair. So thats what keeps me awake at night. MORE: Tank-like wheelchair prototype can scale stairs He made the comments after he spoke about how recent Oxfam figures had suggested that the top 1 percent of the global population owns more wealth than the other 99 percent (quelle surprise). Mr Rupert is also known for referring to himself as a reformed prostitute, after spending a decade working as an investment banker. The struggle is real. Very real. More

Article.title: 1,100 piglets are killed after truck overturns on main road
Article.Description: Warning: Includes scenes some might find upsetting
Article.MainBody: Matt Payton for Metro.co.uk Sunday 14 Jun 2015 2:21 pm Warning: Includes scenes some might find upsetting A truck carrying 2,200 piglets has overturned on a main road, killing more than half of them and leading to hundreds ofbaby pigs escaping into the surrounding area. Theanimal victimson the Ohio highway had been crushed, suffocated and thrown from the vehicle to their deaths. MORE: Pigs have higher IQs than dogs and chimps, says new study Local fire chiefDean Foxtold reporters: There are quite a few pigs that got out and ran from the accident. Theyre in the woods. I dont think well ever get all of them, I really, really dont. Well try as hard as we can to retrieve all of them, but we probably wont retrieve all of them. An officer handing off a piglet after a semi-trailer overturned on State Route 35 in Ohio(Picture: Reuters) Officials told media that the driver lost control of the vehicle crashing into traffic barrier. While the truck driver escaped unhurt, a female passenger was taken to hospital with minor injuries. The driver has had his drivers licence suspended for 183 days. More

Article.title: Two friends ride on ‘Jurassic Park River Adventure’ non-stop for 12 hours
Article.Description: This is one very niche Guinness World Record.
Article.MainBody: Matt Payton for Metro.co.uk Sunday 14 Jun 2015 2:03 pm Is there a theme park ride that you like? What about a theme park ride that you like enough to ride for 12 hours straight? A somewhat tougher question. Well for Jurassic Park fanatics and best friends, Jake and Dave, there was only one ride at Universal Studios in Hollywood California for them to ride their way into the record books. MORE: Jurassic World: An official ranking of dinosaur related deaths in Jurassic Park They told Buzzfeed News : We both have had such an infatuation with the Universal Studios theme park and the film franchise itself that we thought, What could we do in honour of the new film?! It kind of just came to us and we thought, Wait, how many times could we ride The Jurassic Park River Adventure ride in one day? MORE: Dinosaur supervisor demoted after letting everyone get killed in Jurassic Park It was then that we knew what we could do in honour of the new film: ride Jurassic Park all day and set a record! The two friends were supported in their efforts by the Jurassic Park ride crew who gave them a password allowing them to skip the queue all day in pursuit of their goal getting though the ride 50 times in 12 hours. They didnt stop there finally finishing at 60 rides on the theme park thriller within the time limit. These two playedit safe in the midday sun by wearing wide-brimmed hats to avoid sunstroke their mothers would be proud. Jake and Dave mid-record attempt (Picture: YouTube) More

Article.title: Woman killed by ‘celebratory’ wedding gunfire in northern France
Article.Description: The shooter was apparently trying to 'add to the atmosphere'.
Article.MainBody: Harry Readhead for Metro.co.uk Sunday 14 Jun 2015 1:31 pm The shooter was apparently trying to add to the atmosphere (Picture: Google) A young woman died after she was hit in the head by celebratory gunfire following a wedding. The woman, who has not yet been identified, was a guest at the wedding in Marly, northern France, and was standing in the street when a procession of cars came past and shots were fired from the windows. A shotgun shell hit the woman in the head. Emergency services rushed to hospital, but she died soon after arriving.

Article.title: Kit Kat’s four finger trademark gets thumbs down from ECJ
Article.Description: Nestlé argues its chocolate wafer bar’s shape and ‘snap’ novelty have become synonyms with the Kit Kat brand.
Article.MainBody: Metro News Reporter for Metro.co.uk Sunday 14 Jun 2015 1:04 pm Nestl argued that the bars shape and snap are synonymous with the Kit Kat brand (Picture: File) Theres a split-second moment, between stripping a Kit Kat of its wrapper and snapping off the first finger, where you go to pierce the foil crack and remember there hasnt been one for over a decade. Nestl are also having trouble putting their finger on what makes the Kit Kat so memorably distinctive, and it wont be having a break any time soon. The Swiss-based food and beverage company, which filed to protect the Kit Kats four-finger shape through the European Courts of Justice (ECJ) in 2013, had its appeal rejected on June 11 on the grounds that the trademark does not comply with EU law. MORE: Trick or treat? Its a pumpkin pie Kit Kat The ECJ ruled that the Kit Kat trademark did not comply with EU law (Picture: Getty Images) Nestl argues its chocolate wafer bars shape and snap novelty have become synonyms with the Kit Kat brand since it was introduced by Rowntree in 1935. Nestl originally appealed to the UK High Court, but was forced to approach Europe with its case when its biggest rival, Cadbury, blocked the move in 2013. Nestle had claimed 90 percent of people shown a picture of a Kit Kat without its wrapper identified it as a snack associated with the slogan Have a break, have a Kit Kat. However, after hearing Cadburys cross-appeal, the court said that it found no clear distinction between the number of consumers that identified an image of the product with Nestls trademark, and those for whom the trademark alone was sufficient to identify the origin of Nestls Kit Kat. Sharon Daboul, a trademark attorney with intellectual property law firm EIP , told the Guardian that confectionary-producing multinationals are keener than ever to protect product designs such as shapes, sounds and hues, though only some succeed. MORE: This grilled cheese sandwich with a deep fried Kit Kat bun may just have taken food porn too far Toblerone successfully won its case to protect the iconic zigzag prism design (Picture: File) Toblerones zigzag prism, for instance, won its case for shape design protection at the ECJ in 2002. Cadbury meanwhile appealed to trademark its Dairy Milk shade of purple at the UK Supreme Court in 2004, though was blocked in 2014. Shapes of products present a difficulty for companies, Daboul said, because its difficult for applicants to show that consumers look at the shape of the product alone as an indicator of trade origin. She added that consumers normally pay more attention to the label than the shape.

Article.title: Muslims in the Arctic Circle left confused over Ramadan as the sun never sets
Article.Description: The all-day sunshine has left worshippers unable to determine the beginning and ending of the fasting period.
Article.MainBody: Nicholas Reilly for Metro.co.uk Sunday 14 Jun 2015 12:50 pm Ramadan begins later this week (Picture: REUTERS/Esam Al-Fetori) Ramadan is set to begin later this week, and its a period when Muslims embark on a month-long daily fast thats only broken when the sun goes down. So thats led to some very understandable confusion for Muslims living in the Arctic Circle, as most of the region is set to experience sunshine for 24 hours a day. The all-day sunshine has left worshippers unable to differentiate between suhoor (the meal eaten before dawn) and iftar (the meal after sunset) . Now, the Swedish Islamic Association is trying to devise new guidelines to clear up any confusion relating to the fasting periods. MORE: Man who lives next to Milwaukee airport paints Welcome to Cleveland on roof to confuse passengers Mohammed Kharraki, a spokesman for the countrys Islamic Association said: Weve got two difficult questions, not just when you can break the fast in the north but also when you should start fasting. Youre supposed to start fasting before the sun rises, at dawn. But there is no real dawn in the summer months in Stockholm. Its believed that the new regulations will involve allowing those affected to break their fast at the same time as Muslims in southern Sweden. More

Article.title: Mexican teens perform spectacularly ill-advised Nazi-themed dance routine
Article.Description: Unless you're performing in The Producers on Broadway, Nazi-themed dances are generally not a great idea.
Article.MainBody: Harry Readhead for Metro.co.uk Sunday 14 Jun 2015 12:46 pm As a rule of thumb, unless youre part of the cast of The Producers, Nazi-themed dances are not a great idea. But that didnt stop a group of Mexican teenagers donning military uniform, brandishing a swastika flag and goose-stepping around a stage. The three-minute routine, performed at Cheerdance ACMX in Guadalajara, has polarised internet users. MORE: TV historian makes a lot of people angry by comparing the SNP to the Nazis (Picture: YouTube) Some have adopted the attitude that it is just a dance, while others have called the teenagers stupid and criticised the competition for allowing the group to enter. One YouTube user even demands that the choreographer be fired for their part in planning the routine. Enrique Casas, director general and organiser of Cheerdance ACMX, defended the dance, saying it was not intentionally offensive and was simply acting out a story. Art in any form can be surprising, he told FOX News Latino .

Article.title: Man who lives next to Milwaukee airport paints ‘Welcome to Cleveland’ on roof to confuse passengers
Article.Description: Mark Gubin: part-time artist, part-time photographer, full-time wind-up merchant.
Article.MainBody: Harry Readhead for Metro.co.uk Sunday 14 Jun 2015 12:10 pm Part-time artist, full-time wind-up merchant (Picture: Mark Gubin) Mark Gubin may sometimes work as an artist and photographer, but hes a full-time wind-up merchant. Decades ago, he realised that passengers landing at Milwaukee airport would see his house as they descended. So he painted WELCOME TO CLEVELAND on his roof. According to Mr. Gubin, the sign has caused a lot of confusion for flyers over the years. Which, of course, is its intention. He recalls one incident where passengers on a Denver to Cleveland flight due to stop in Milwaukee en route started panicking because they thought the plane had skipped its layover. And Mr. Gubin still keeps a letter from former Common Council president Ben E. Johnson, in which Mr. Johnson complains the sign is causing outrage and panic among air passengers. Keep up the good work, Mr. Gubin.

Article.title: Pigs have higher IQs than dogs and chimps, says new study
Article.Description: 'There is good scientific evidence to suggest we need to rethink our overall relationship to them.'
Article.MainBody: Matt Payton for Metro.co.uk Sunday 14 Jun 2015 11:56 am Dogs look up at us.Cats look down at us.Pigstreat us as equals, said Sir Winston Churchill. Turns out the war-time Prime Ministerwasnt far wrong, as scientists have found out that pigs have greater problem-solving abilities than both dogs and chimpanzees our closest genetic relatives. MORE: Heres what happens when Miss Piggy gets catcalled Neuroscientist Lori Marino of Emory University and the NonhumanRights Project said of the new study:We have shown that pigs share a number of cognitive capacities with other highly intelligent species such as dogs, chimpanzees, elephants, dolphins, and even humans. There is good scientific evidence to suggest we need to rethink our overall relationship to them. MORE: Its just Miley Cyrus posing totally naked with her pet pig The group analysed dozens of studies compiling a series of conclusions about our porky friends. They found out that pigs have very good long term memories, can learn complicated series of signals, enjoy playing together and live in complex co-operative social communities. The Nonhuman Rights Project and Peta have claimed that such scientific conclusions demand much better treatment of pigs being bred for slaughter.

Article.title: France tells citizens to stop living up to their unfriendly stereotype in bid to boost tourism
Article.Description: Zut alors!
Article.MainBody: Nicholas Reilly for Metro.co.uk Sunday 14 Jun 2015 11:42 am Oui? (Picture: KENZO TRIBOUILLARD/AFP/Getty Images) French people, stop being so moody and unwelcoming. Thats the call of French Foreign Minister Laurent Fabius, who has urged the Gallic people to stop living up to their international reputation for unfriendliness. Paris, for example, has been named one of the worlds most hostile places for foreign visitors in a number of international surveys. And speaking at the launch of a new scheme designed to boost tourist levels, Mr Fabius said: Tourism is a national treasure that needs to be protected, nurtured and developed thats the aim of all these measures. But he then went on to encourage French people to be more welcoming to tourists. To put it diplomatically, we have room for improvement here. When we come up against a foreign tourist, we are all ambassadors for France he said. He made the comments at the unveiling of a new Tourism Investment Fund, which hopes to boost French tourist levels to 100 million by 2020. The campaign also aims to increase the spending habits of visitors, with tourist revenues hitting 47.1 billion euros in 2013, compared to the 130.4 billion dollars from visitors to the United States. And in an attempt to lure in more visitors, Mr Fabius also called on French TV channels to broadcast the Tour de France and create documentaries that promote different regions of the country. More

Article.title: Abused dog whose snout was bound with electrical tape is on the mend
Article.Description: Caitlyn's tongue was receiving no blood flow, and was swollen and oozing pus.
Article.MainBody: Harry Readhead for Metro.co.uk Sunday 14 Jun 2015 10:30 am Warning: Graphic images Caitlyn is on the mend (Picture: Charleston Animal Society) A stray dog found with her snout bound so tightly with tape that she required surgery is on the mend, animal society officials have said. Caitlyn, a Staffordshire terrier cross, was 15 months old when she was found on a doorstep in North Charleston, South Carolina, with thick electrical tape wrapped around her snout. MORE: Boy, 3, who wrote a letter to his beagle in doggy heaven receives a heart-warming reply The 15-month-old was listed as being in critical condition (Picture: Charleston Animal Society) Her finder took her to the Charleston Animal Society, where she was listed as being in critical condition and underwent surgery to repair her cheek and lips. According to officials, Caitlyns tongue, which was swollen and oozing pus, had no blood flow as it was stuck between her teeth. MORE: Arsenal must pay 24.6m to complete transfer of Monacos Geoffrey Kondogbia Caitlyns tongue was swollen and oozing pus (Picture: Charleston Animal Society) But animal society officials have said that Caitlyns incisions have healed and she is now very much on the mend. William Leonard Dodson, 41, was arrested and charged with animal cruelty on 4 June. According to court documents, Dodson bought the dog for $20 and said he had taped her snout to stop her barking. William Dodson said that the tape was to stop the dog barking, court documents revealed More

Article.title: Want to live longer? Eat this, study claims
Article.Description: What is the key to long life? Healthy, happy relationships? Daily exercise? Regular baths in the blood of virgins? Apparently not.
Article.MainBody: Harry Readhead for Metro.co.uk Sunday 14 Jun 2015 9:25 am Eating peanuts may extend your life (Picture: Getty Images) What is the key to long life? Healthy, happy relationships? Daily exercise? Regular baths in the blood of virgins? Apparently not. According to a new study, eating peanuts might just extend your life. Researchers in the Netherlands found that people who ate at least a third of an ounce (10g) of peanuts were 23 percent less likely to die over a 10-year period than those who didnt eat any. Peanut-eaters seemed to be less at risk from respiratory diseases, neurodegenerative diseases and diabetes (Picture: Getty Images) Peanut-eaters seemed to be especially resistant to respiratory diseases, neurodegenerative diseases and diabetes. It was remarkable that substantially lower mortality was already observed [at this level of consumption], said Piet van den Brandt, a co-author of the study and professor of epidemiology at Maastricht University. Professor van den Brandt and his colleagues are not yet sure exactly what it is about peanuts that seems to extend life, though they said that peanuts and other nuts contain healthy fats, vitamins, fiber and antioxidants, which are known to provide numerous health benefits. The study, which involved 120,000 middle-aged Dutch men and women, also found that the benefits of eating nuts plateaus at 15g daily.

Article.title: Woman facing charges after horrifying video of four-month-old kitten being set on fire
Article.Description: Warning: Images viewers may find distressing
Article.MainBody: Ollie McAteer for Metro.co.uk Saturday 13 Jun 2015 10:47 pm Liquid is slashed over the four-month-old (Picture: YouTube) An upsetting video has emerged showing a woman set fire to a kitten. The footage, shot in Mexico, shows the woman splashing liquid on the four-month-old cat before lighting its fur with a match. At first the cat flees, but she creeps up behind it and grabs it by the scruff of the neck. She places it on the ground and successfully sets fire to the kitten. The kitten is picked up by the scruff of the neck (Picture: YouTube) The video was uploaded online and quickly went viral after horrifying viewers. Animal rights activists circulated the clip with the hashtag LadyQuemaGatos (lady burns cats) in a bid to locate those responsible. Amigos Pro Animal group visited the womenwithprosecutors. The cat is held down as the woman attempts to light it (Picture: YouTube) A spokesperson said: We had a chance to speak with the girls and they showed remorse for what they had done. They claim the cat survived the ordeal but now face criminal charges and a fine. More

Article.title: Never stand in front of a boat’s jet shower or this will happen
Article.Description: We were just happy to see this man get up.
Article.MainBody: Jimmy Nsubuga for Metro.co.uk Saturday 13 Jun 2015 10:15 pm We were just happy to see this man get up. A video showed him being thrown to the ground after being hit by an intense jet shower. At first it looked as if he could have been wiped out completely. MORE: The mystery behind this 94-year-old war veterans stomach pain is finally solved This shower wasnt refreshing (Picture: YouTube/RIPKing) But once it was clear he was OK we could all start laughing at his stupidity of choosing to get in front of the boat. His mates, who probably convinced him to do it, were amusedas well. LMFAO!!!!!!! I couldnt stop laughing my f**king ass off, wrote YouTube user GoMiGman.

Article.title: Take a look around the world’s first £120MILLION super yacht casino hotel
Article.Description: *Packs bags*
Article.MainBody: 189 rooms from 179 a night 142 metres long and seven storeys high Spa and fitness centre Cocktail lounges and balcony bars Fine dining restaurants Grand ballroom Sunborn Gibraltar is the inception of a surge of super yacht hotels. It already has a sister yacht in London near the ExCel and plans are well under way for chains to spring up in Barcelona,North America, South-East Asia, the Middle East and Russia. A rise in so-called yotels would be more than welcomed, if Sunborn Gibraltar is the blueprint for future vessels. The majority of rooms have a private balcony or terrace area, are fitted with glistening minibars, a spacious bathroom area and more importantly have 24 hour room service. Steak at 3.41am? Not a problem. And if you some how get itchy feet on board the mammoth boat, theres a plethora of activities to do on land. Off-road safaris, wine tasting at a vineyard and golf a one of Spains top courses all can be arranged by the concierge wholl sort out a private jet, helicopter or car (if youre a peasant). The Sky Restaurant serves up everything from brunch to afternoon tea (Picture: Sunborn) Moored in the Ocean Village Marina yards away from Gibraltars iconic rock (Picture: Sunborn) All rooms come with a swanky minibar and 24 hour room service (Picture: Sunborn) You can get a room for half the price of Londons swanky hotels (Picture: Sunborn) Fun Facts British overseas territory meaning you can pay with sterling Located on the southern end of the Iberian Peninsula at the entrance of the Mediterranean, sharing a border with Spain An area of 2.6 sq miles Population of 30,000 Home to the iconic1,400ft rock There are more roads insidethe rock than on the outside in Gibraltar If all this wasnt enough, Sunborn Gibraltar is now home to the worlds first super yacht casino. The state-of-the-art slots, table games and VIP suites availableevery day until 4am opened last month and is already attracting big bawlers from around the world. Its officialopeningcoincided with the exciting launch of popular leisure brand La Sala similar to Nikki Beach and Ocean Beach club. You know, the sorts of awesome places frequented by celebs where champagne spraying is accepted, nay, encouraged. Most of Gibraltar descended upon Sunborn earlier this month to sample the live music, cocktails and class hosted by La Sala. Ian Radford, La Sala founder, said: This is really exciting news for both Gibraltar and for the brand. La Sala is so much more than a restaurant, its a lifestyle and now we are bringing this unique concept to Ocean Village, offering the ultimate social and dining experience on-board thefive star Sunborn yacht hotel. Sunborn Gibraltar has teamed up with restaurant La Sala which is similar to Nikki Beach or Ocean Beach club (Picture: Sunborn) The launch of La Sala coincided with the official opening of the worlds first super yacht casino (Picture: Sunborn) Here it is, in all its glory (Picture: Sunborn) An entrance that sings class': Sunborn Gibraltars casino and La Sala launch earlier this month (Picture: Sunborn) Sunborn Gibraltar has a sister yacht in London near the ExCel (Picture: Sunborn) Youd be forgiven for thinking Gibraltar is plagued by the stereotype of overweight, tattooed Brits wearing three-quarter-lengths. It has yet to shrug this off. But it will. Andthe introduction of Sunborn has sent shockwaves of swag rippling across the Ocean Village Marina. This is how to experience Gibraltar in style. For more information or to make a reservation visit the Sunborn Gibraltar hotel website . More

Article.title: Great-grandfather, 83, walked home by PC after catching wrong bus
Article.Description: Good human points.
Article.MainBody: Ollie McAteer for Metro.co.uk Saturday 13 Jun 2015 8:56 pm The kindhearted gesture was snapped and went viral (Picture: South Beds) Is your heart warm yet? It will be once youve read the story behind this picture. The image shows PC Chris Stevens and great-grandfather Richard Walker walking hand in hand. The 83-year-old caught the wrong bus and was faced with a quarter-mile hike home in Kingsthorpe, Northampton. PC Stevens spotted Richard leaning up against a wall. He grabbed his heavy shopping bag and offered to walk the elderly man home. A photo of the kindhearted gesture was snapped and, inevitably, went viral. PC Chris Stevens said its nice to seepolice getting recognition(Picture: PA) Richard said: I got off the bus when I realised it wasnt going on the route I thought it would take. It meant I had a few hundred yards to walk and thats when the officer saw me and asked if I was alright. He helped me cross over the road and took hold of my shopping and walked me home. We just chatted and passed the time. He did a good job and Im grateful. Mr Stevens added: His wife looked a bit shocked when she opened the door and I was there with him, but he was fine. Its nice that the police are getting recognition for doing good things, but its nothing more than any of my colleagues would have done. These things happen on a daily basis up and down the country.

Article.title: Women in Iran are rebelling against compulsory hijab by exposing their hair in beautiful and brave pics
Article.Description: Iranian women are finally enjoying the feeling of the wind in their hair.
Article.MainBody: Follow us Women in Iran are rebelling against compulsory hijab by exposing their hair in beautiful and bravepics Nicole Morley for Metro.co.uk Saturday 13 Jun 2015 7:02 pm The protest is powerful but peaceful (Picture: Facebook/My Stealthy Freedom) Allowing the wind to blow through your hair is an offence punishable by law for women in Iran. Iranian ladieshave been legally required to cover their hair while out in public since 1979. The law is enforced pretty heavily and many woman are arrested or fined by police if they fail to cover up with the attire considered appropriate. But brave ladies have begun rebelling against the law which they feel is outdated and unfair. Women of Iran are empowering one another (Picture: Facebook/My Stealthy Freedom) Launching a subtle yet powerful protest, Iranian females are empowering and inspiring one another with pictures of themselves without their head scarves on the Facebook group My Stealthy Freedom . Alongside their courageous photos, the women are revealing how freedom from their hijabs make them feel. They want to be heard (Picture: Facebook/My Stealthy Freedom One member writes: I want my real self, which is reflected inside me, to be reflected outside as well; I dont want to be masked neither by make-up nor some imposed dress. I am an Iranian woman and I have never wanted to let my own body be politicised by Irans mandatory dress code, adds another. Feeling the wind in her hair (Picture: Facebook/My Stealthy Freedom) As an Iranian woman, I am against compulsory hijab. I want freedom, for myself, for my daughter and for all women in my homeland. The group has already attracted 809,000 members. Feeling free (Picture: Facebook/My Stealthy Freedom)

Article.title: Couple up all night with mangy fox after it breaks in and poos everywhere
Article.Description: The animal broke into a home through a cat-flap and destroyed the couple's bedroom.
Article.MainBody: Ollie McAteer for Metro.co.uk Saturday 13 Jun 2015 6:42 pm This remarkable footage shows a particularly bizarre fox rescue. The animal broke into a home through a cat-flap, destroyed the couples bedroom and defecated everywhere. But instead of trying to usher the fox out, they locked it in their room to try and minimize the damage it did after smashing several mirrors. The couple bunked up with the urban critter all night, and at one point even laid next to each other on the bed. It broke in just as the couple went to bed (Picture: YouTube) Simon, of UK foundation Wildlife Aid, filmed the rescue, branding it the most bizarre incident hes been called to for some time. The video was uploaded to YouTube in May. Part of the description reads: After being caught, she was brought back to the centre, where she was treated for severe mange. She will now stay with us for about four weeks and be released when she has fully recovered!

Article.title: Swimmer, 15, suffers serious spinal injuries after bus mows her and two others down at European Games
Article.Description: The driver has been arrested.
Article.MainBody: Follow us Swimmer, 15, suffers serious spinal injuries after bus mows her and two others down at EuropeanGames Ollie McAteer for Metro.co.uk Saturday 13 Jun 2015 4:37 pm Warning: Graphic content A bus driver has been arrested after a coachmowed downthree 15-year-old Austrian swimmers at the European Games in Azerbaijan, leaving one seriously injured. One of the athletes, Vanessa Sahinovic, suffered severe spinal injuries after being hit by the vehicle, which veered on to the pavement on Thursday morning. Her teammate, Luna Pajer, suffereda broken elbow, while the third girl, Verena Breit, escaped with bruises. Sahinovic and Pajer were flown home to Austria for treatment. Veli Ahmadov is accused of a breach of road rules over the incident in the capital, Baku, and a criminal case has been opened against him, the Azerbaijani Interior Ministry and prosecutors said in a joint statement. The coach ploughs into three swimmers at the European Games (Picture: YouTube) The statement said Ahmadov was the driver of a bus which struck three members of Austrias synchronised swimming team in the athletes village on Thursday morning. Reports in Azerbaijani media suggested some staff at the village had been drinking on site. The European Games confirmed said it is looking into these claims. The organising committees chief operating officer, Simon Clegg, said claims of drunkenness were a very serious suggestion and would be investigated immediately. There is absolutely nothing to suggest at this moment in time that alcohol played any part in the tragic incident, he said.

Article.title: Someone’s come forward to claim the £93MILLION Euro jackpot and we’re all jealous
Article.Description: *Pulls fake smile*
Article.MainBody: Ollie McAteer for Metro.co.uk Saturday 13 Jun 2015 3:51 pm Jel (Picture: PA) A ticket-holder who scooped a 93,388,943 in the EuroMillions jackpot has come forward to claim their prize and we couldnt be happier for them :-| Ranking sixth on the National Lottery rich list, the winner could receive their money as early as Monday, Camelot said. It remains a mystery who the lucky winner is and they can choose to remain anonymous if they wish. Yesterdays jackpot was the biggest win in the UK so far this year. The ticket matched the five main numbers 5, 8, 10, 11 and 37 plus the two Lucky Star numbers 7 and 9 picked for last nights draw. The top prize had not been won since May 26. MORE: 8 things the EuroMillions winner could buy with their 93 million A National Lottery spokeswoman said: Were delighted Fridays ticket-holder has come forward to claim this truly life changing prize. The win ranks sixth biggest on the National Lottery rich list and is the third EuroMillions jackpot to be won here in the UK this year. Top of the list are Colin and Chris Weir from Largs, North Ayrshire, who banked 161 million in July 2011, making them the biggest lottery winners in Europe. A year after the Weirs struck it lucky, Adrian and Gillian Bayford won 148,656,000. They separated in 2013. In 2010 a winner who chose to remain anonymous collected 113 million. Last year Neil Trotter, a former car mechanic from south London, won 107,932,603. In 2011 Dave and Angela Dawes from Cambridgeshire proved it was third time lucky when they won 101,203,600, having only played EuroMillions twice before. More

Article.title: Man spots banana moving – then spider bursts out
Article.Description: When will this horror end.
Article.MainBody: Ollie McAteer for Metro.co.uk Saturday 13 Jun 2015 2:46 pm When will this horror end. The spider siege is relentless. We can deal withthe eight-legged freaks on bananas but inside them!? Imagine reaching overfor one of your five a day to notice something squirming beneath the skin. Kaleb Lechowski did just that and began recording the bizarre scene. Slowly, the skin rips and then bursts to reveal a mammoth spider. *Faints* ARGH (Picture: YouTube)

Article.title: Thai man lets nest of red ants bite his genitals
Article.Description: Never try.
Article.MainBody: Ollie McAteer for Metro.co.uk Saturday 13 Jun 2015 2:14 pm For some unknown reason, a Thai man has stuffed red ants down his pants. A video, which has emerged on YouTube, showsa man stripped down to his underwear as his friends pick up a branch covered withthe fiery insects. The nest is shoved against his genitals and, for a moment, the guy appears to be dealing with it well. Then all hell breaks loose. He screams in agony, throws away his pants and gets hosed down by his pals. Never try.

Article.title: Lightning hitting a beach in slow motion is pretty epic
Article.Description: Wow.
Article.MainBody: Amy Willis for Metro.co.uk Saturday 13 Jun 2015 2:00 pm This slow motion footage shows the exact moment a bolt of lightning struck a beach. Footage of the lightning strike was filmed by Clint Blevins during a storm at Daytona Beach in Florida, then published on YouTube. Clint set up his shot on the beach first of all. Seems pretty innocuous. Then theelectrical dischargeis seen hitting the salt water and illuminating the beach. In slow motion we can see how this has the appearance of fire in the sky. Which quickly fades away into the air before disappearing entirely. Lightning seriously injured a boy at the same beach this week while he was fishing with his father.

Article.title: Gamer hacks Legend of Zelda to create amazing marriage proposal
Article.Description: Most creative proposal of the year?
Article.MainBody: Nicholas Reilly for Metro.co.uk Saturday 13 Jun 2015 1:16 pm (Picture: Natalie/Funnybunnyphoto.com) When it comes to popping the question, most people will opt to take their loved one to a place of real significance before getting down on one knee and asking them for their hand. But if youre a gamer, you instead opt to reprogram one of you and your girlfriends favourite games so that it contains a marriage proposal. Obviously. Thats what James Dowdell did, when he reprogrammed The Legend of Zelda for the NES console so that it contained a pretty important message for girlfriend Natalie. Firstly, he grabbed a cartridge. (Picture: Natalie/Funnybunnyphoto.com) And then it was a case of using some seriously impressive skills to create a character that looked like Natalie. He painstakingly sorted through code. Lots and lots of code. Then this emerged as the final product and its totally brilliant. Unsurprisingly, she said yes and hes even wearing a Zelda t-shirt to celebrate that fact. (Picture: Natalie/Funnybunnyphoto.com) Oh, and she received this awesome engagement ring. (Picture: Natalie/Funnybunnyphoto.com)

Article.title: Slutwalk protester who held ‘No Rape culture’ sign is upset with people
Article.Description: Lauren Southern was filmed waving the controversial sign as she attended the protest in Vancouver, Canada.
Article.MainBody: Nicholas Reilly for Metro.co.uk Saturday 13 Jun 2015 11:15 am A female writerwho attended a Slutwalk rally holding a sign that read There is no rape culture in the West has accused her critics of spreading slanderous lies. Lauren Southern was filmed waving the controversial sign as she attended the feminist protest in Vancouver, Canada. In a YouTube video entitled What Really Happened At The Vancouver Slut Walk, Ms. Southern explained that she had been subjected to completely slanderous lies about the events that actually happened. Detailing one accusation, she said: The most prominent one [accusation] being that I yelled over and tried to silence women who had been assaulted. (Picture: YouTube) I did no such thing and wouldnt dream of it. I waited for the woman who was speaking to pass her part and share her story before I went and stood in the crowd. I stood silently and simply showed my opinion, not interrupting anyone. It was you ladies at the Slutwalk who walked up the stairs and tried to hide my sign from people watching. Ms. Southern then proceeds to show footage of the event, which seemingly supports her version of events with protestors appearing to block out her controversial sign. Lauren added: Im astonished and disgusted that people are knowingly lying and trying to ruin my character because I disagree with them and I respect the right to an opinion and believe you should be able to try it. Slutwalks are a series of organised protests that began after a Toronto police officer remarked in 2011 that women should avoid dressing like sluts if they wish to avoid sexual assault. More

Article.title: Mum and toddler found after they vanished when court ruled tot should live with dad
Article.Description: Avon and Somerset Police said they are safe and well.
Article.MainBody: Ollie McAteer for Metro.co.uk Friday 12 Jun 2015 10:35 pm Rebecca and her son Ethan have been found (Picture: PA) Rebecca Minnock and her three-year-old son Ethan Williamshave been found,Avon and Somerset Police said. They went missing two weeks ago after a court ruled Ethan should be handed over to his father. Ethans grandmother,Louise Minnock, has been sentenced to ten days in prison and her partner Andrew Butt for 28 days for contempt of court. Louise admitted lying about her partner driving Rebecca and Ethan from Highbridge, in Somerset, to Cheltenham in Gloucestershire late last month. The court ruling had taken place earlier that day. However, Butt who said the whole thing was a publicity stunt claimshe did not know where they went after he dropped them off. RogerWilliams with his son Ethan (Picture: SWNS) He later issueda written statement pleading Rebecca to come out of hiding. It read: Becky, you need to seriously look at the situation. Its only going to get worse, not just for you but for all of us. There are some very good people who will help and support you. We have made our point, we have our support. Come home. The bitter custody battle led to a search of the mother and her son (Picture: SWNS) Judge Wildblood told Butt: Yesterday I said that I was in no doubt that you know precisely where Rebecca Minnock and Ethan Williams went that day because you conveyed them both to their destination in your motor car that morning. Today you have admitted taking mother and child to Cheltenham but you have continued to lie about where in Cheltenham you took them. You know how important it is that Ethan and Rebecca Minnock are found. They cannot remain in hiding for ever and you know that they will found in the very near future. In the meantime Ethan is not receiving the stability and care that he should. Further, you know how serious it is that orders have been made for Ethan to live with his father and that those orders are being thwarted by Rebeccas deliberate disobedience, a disobedience that you have assisted. More

Article.title: Cambridge University is hiring a Lego professor
Article.Description: *Applies*
Article.MainBody: Ollie McAteer for Metro.co.uk Friday 12 Jun 2015 10:26 pm *Applies* (Picture: PA) One of the worlds best universities is planning to hire a professor of Lego. The lucky candidate will be the head of their own research department at prestigious Cambridge. Officials say the role is expected to be created within the Faculty of Education after the university received 4million of donations from the Lego Foundation. Cambridges general board has recommended for the Lego professorship of play in education, development and learning to start in October 2015. The professor will be director of the Research Centre on Play in Education, Development and Learning. A Cambridge University spokesman said more details will be provided after the proposal has gone before Regent House in October. The Lego Foundation owns 25 per cent of Denmark-based toy company Lego.

Article.title: This is why you don’t get absolutely smashed at your own wedding
Article.Description: That was a frosty honeymoon.
Article.MainBody: Ollie McAteer for Metro.co.uk Friday 12 Jun 2015 9:04 pm It was the couples first dance, but probably their last as well. This groom broke the golden wedding rule: Dont get absolutely obliterated beyond belief. He should have stopped at the robot, but he foolishly decided to give his new wife a lap dance in front of all their friends and family. Unfortunately, on this occasion, alcohol won. You can actually pin-point the exact moment wifey regrets everything: The shame (Picture: YouTube)

Article.title: Bradford school stabbing: 14-year-old boy charged with attempted murder
Article.Description: Teachers had previously appealed to the boy to hand himself in.
Article.MainBody: Ollie McAteer for Metro.co.uk Friday 12 Jun 2015 5:27 pm Picture shows the moment a boy was arrested in connection with the stabbing(Picture: Facebook) A 14-year-old boy has been charged with attempted murder over the stabbing of a school teacher. He is accused ofplunging a kitchen knife into the stomach of Bradford-based teacher Vincent Uzomah, 50. Mr Uzomah was taken to hospital and his injuries are not believed to be life-threatening. Police located and arrested the teen in Bradford city centre following the attack in a classroom at Dixons Kings Academy. Teachers had previously appealed to the boy to hand himself in. Police described the incident as isolated. A video of the arrest emerged on Facebook (Picture: Facebook) More

Article.title: The #distractinglysexy hashtag is the perfect response to sexism in science
Article.Description: Good job, Twitter
Article.MainBody: Nicholas Reilly for Metro.co.uk Friday 12 Jun 2015 3:17 pm Sir Tim Hunt (Picture: Johnny Green/PA Wire) Earlier this week, Nobel Prize-winning scientist Tim Hunt faced a barrage of criticism after he made a series of ill-advised comments about the trouble with girls in scientific research. Speaking at a conference in South Korea, Hunt said: Three things happen when they [women] are in the lab. You fall in love with them, they fall in love with you, and when you criticise them they cry. But while he claimed his comments were light-hearted and ironic, he was slammed for an apparently regressive attitude to the battle for female equality in science, and has now resigned from his post at University College London. Since then, Twitter has lampooned his comments in the best way possible, using the #DistractinglySexy hashtag to encourage female scientists to share pictures of themselves at work and prove that Hunt is totally wrong. Look at these goggles, were in love. . @VagendaMagazine just too #distractinglysexy in my must-have glasses + safety goggles pic.twitter.com/k3Fwg4gQkH

Article.title: Elderly man suffers heart attack after terrifying attack on house in broad daylight
Article.Description: His home was pelted with bricks, paint and smoke bombs.
Article.MainBody: Ollie McAteer for Metro.co.uk Friday 12 Jun 2015 3:15 pm An elderly man has been taken to hospital after suffering a suspected heart attack when his house was pelted with bricks, paint and smoke bombs. It was the third attack on the home in Stockport, Greater Manchester, which the 68-year-old victim shares with his wife and daughter. Police have released CCTV footage of the relentless campaign of abuse and vandalism and have appealed for anyone with information to come forward. Detective inspector Cheryl Hughes said: It is no exaggeration to say this family have suffered a terrifying campaign of abuse at the hands of this gang. MORE: The hoodie that lets you successfully sneak booze into events this summer The gang smashes several windows in the attack (Picture: YouTube) After three attacks, they are living on their nerves in a boarded-up home in which they no longer feel safe. It is heartbreaking to think they feel so distressed in what should be the sanctity of their own home, without any clue as to why they are under repeated attack. Following the last attack, the man was hospitalised with a suspected heart attack and while he is recovering, clearly the stress of what he and his family have endured in recent weeks has taken an unimaginable toll on the familys lives. On the last occasion, June 5, five masked offenders are seen pulling up outside the house before throwing up to 15 bricks as children and parents on the school run looked on. The gang then got back into a car thought to be a stolen black Nissan Qashqai before driving off. Anyone with information is asked to call police on 0161 856 9987 or the independent charity Crimestoppers, anonymously, on 0800 555 111.

Article.title: The hoodie that lets you successfully sneak booze into events this summer
Article.Description: It's brilliant I tell you!
Article.MainBody: Ollie McAteer for Metro.co.uk Friday 12 Jun 2015 2:45 pm Theres no pride in stuffing abottle of Jgermeister down your pants as you pass through security. But now theres a shameless way of smuggling booze into events. Introducing the Boozie. Basically its a hoodie with hidden hip flasks. The alcohol is cleverly concealed in the hood with drawstrings acting as straws. Its brilliant I tell you! But they need our money to make it a reality.

Article.title: Peeping Tom stalks his dad on the loo, in bed, and in the nude
Article.Description: A new type of home invasion movie?
Article.MainBody: Metro News Reporter for Metro.co.uk Friday 12 Jun 2015 1:59 pm A video of a dad being relentlessly stalked around his home shows himon the toilet, in bed, and in the nude. Youtuber Thomas Goldricks documentary dubbed Papa Cam 1 has had more than 40,000 hits within 24 hours. The clip shows the peeping Tomspying on hisdad round thecrib and jumping out with the video camera. Papa Cam 1(Picture: Youtube/Thomas Goldrick) Theres no limit to his creepin and nowhere is safe or restricted. It includes catching him asleep,on the toilet,then at its climax completely starkers. Despite the viral stars dislike of the intrusion hecontinues the light-hearted home invasion. This is surely a warning to all who enjoy the freedom of strutting through their house in just their birthday suit.

Article.title: Penis transplant man has successfully impregnated his girlfriend, says surgeon
Article.Description: Before the operation the young man had only 1cm left of his penis.
Article.MainBody: Matt Payton for Metro.co.uk Friday 12 Jun 2015 1:59 pm The surgery team who performed the penile transplant (Picture: Stellenbosch University) The first man to ever receive a peniletransplant is to become a father according to the doctor who operated on him. The unidentified 21-year-old South African had undergone a nine-hour operation in December to replace a penis he lost in a botched circumcision. Before the operation the young man had only 1cm left of his penis. Heunderwent this groundbreaking surgery atStellenbosch University near Cape Town. MORE: Genital enhancements are on the rise (yes, thats vagina and penis plumping) The Surgeon, Dr Andre Van der Merwe told the BBC : This is what we intended, that he should be able to stand up and be able to urinate and have intercourse, so it is a milestone for him. Dr Van der Merwe said that his patient was not expected to be infertile as the issues were not with his testes but with the penis. More

Article.title: Adolf Hitler may have hidden a treasure map leading to a £50m haul in a sheet of music
Article.Description: A Dutch violinist claims to have figured out the code and knows where the gold is stashed.
Article.MainBody: Search Metro Follow us Adolf Hitler may have hidden a treasure map leading to a 50m haul in a sheet ofmusic Jimmy Nsubuga for Metro.co.uk Friday 12 Jun 2015 1:58 pm Theres a map in Gottfried Federleins Marsch-Impromptu score (Picture: Facebook) A man claims to have located 50m worth of Nazi treasure after deciphering a code in a sheet of music. Whats more surprising is Cyril Whistler has released the name of the burial spot instead of going to claim the diamonds and gold for himself. Theyre located in Mittenwald, Germany, according to the map found in Gottfried Federleins Marsch-Impromptu score. Theroute was supposedly put there by Martin Bormann, who was Adolf Hitlers secretary. MORE: Gordon Brown claimed expenses for 732 worth of pen cartridges Cyril Whistler is convinced (Picture: Facebook) The more I studied the piece, the more I discovered. The letters, the number and the signs reveal a route, Dutch violin maker Whistler told the Express . I soon discovered a typical number that returns over and over again, between the bars as well as encrypted throughout the score. But theres a slight hitch that might explain Whistlers reluctance to go and fetch the 100 gold bars and diamonds for himself. Adolf Hitlers secretary hid the map in the score apparently Picture: Corbis) Theyre apparently on land owned by the German army and he needs permission to start digging. Although he denies he is interested in expensive stash, nicknamed Tears of the Wolf, despitespending two years working out the code.

Article.title: White water rafting is probably the best job in the world… but you need to spend 20 years in training
Article.Description: Two decades of riding rapids and eating barbecues...must be tough
Article.MainBody: Search Metro Follow us White water rafting is probably the best job in the world but you need to spend 20 years intraining Matt Payton for Metro.co.uk Friday 12 Jun 2015 12:54 pm To guide a inflatable raft down the Grand Canyon must be really intimidating what about a shallow wooden rowingboatthat hasnt changed in design since the 19th century? Amber Shannon, 27, has spent nine years learning the Colorado river rapids but her eyes are on taking wooden dory boats through the canyon. MORE: Developers want to spoil the Grand Canyon with a huge shopping centre However, she still has 11 more years on the job before she will be allowed to pilotpassengers through the rapids in a dory on herown. Experience is key to guiding these boats as theydo not react at all well to rocks, easilycapsizing and breaking up if hit at the wrong point. Now this looks fun (Picture: Vimeo) While many people might see twenty years as a long time to earn achance to pilot such a vessel getting to spend two decadesridingrapids and eating barbecues on the way down doesnt seem too bad. So until she gets the green light Amberwill continue to practice with the dory while guiding the baggage boat day-to-day. Needless to say Amber Shannonhas serious commitment and upper body muscles. Amber Shannon, 27 (Picture: Vimeo) More

Article.title: British tourist Eleanor Hawkins is JAILED for posing on Malaysian mountain naked
Article.Description: Ellie appeared in court today.
Article.MainBody: She had admitted to the public nuisance offence during an appearance at Kota Kinabalu Magistrates Court in Malaysia today. The group of backpackers were arrested after photos emerged of them stripping naked on Mount Kinabalu. Eleanor was arrested at Tawau airport on Tuesday as she was flying from the island of Borneo to the capital, Kuala Lumpur. Therecent engineering graduate was one of four Westerners who pleaded guilty to committing obscene acts in a public place. Tourists offended locals with their nudity (Picture: Rex/ShutterStock) Canadian siblings Lindsey Peterson, 23, and Danielle, 22, and Dutch tourist Dylan Snel, 23, also received the same sentence. They group were ordered to pay 5,000 Malaysian ringgit (approx. 860) and face prison for three days. But the court decided their sentences could be back-dated to reflect the days they have already spent in police custody. The public prosecutor called for a harsh sentence to attempt to deter similar behaviour, but the judge ruled that as the four defendants had shown remorse, their jail time could begin on June 9. Eleanor and her fellow holidaymakers are expected to fly home fromMalaysia tomorrow, her lawyer said.

Article.title: This dodgy Pokemon tattoo has been transformed into a work of art
Article.Description: These cover-ups are seriously impressive
Article.MainBody: Nicholas Reilly for Metro.co.uk Friday 12 Jun 2015 12:01 pm (Picture: Imgur) Even the most devoted Pokemon fan would probably admit that the Pikachu tattoo on the left side of the image isnt exactly a fitting tribute to the iconic comic book character. But then a proper tattoo artist got involved, and turned the crudely drawn image into an adorable inking of Pikachu creating a self portrait. And as it turns out, theres plenty of tattoo artists who are willing to transform a shoddy inking into a true work of art. Likethis dodgy inking of the Grim Reaper, transformed into a stunning portrait of a Native American. Needing to get rid of that unfortunate memory of your ex? Turn it into a cool looking bird. That hideous skull and crossbones looks a lot more attractive when it adopts the guise of a sprawling, flower covered anchor. The before shot looks like something from Shaun of the Dead. The after is a stunning likeness and a great tribute. However, it doesnt have to be all about covering dodgy tattoos. Sometimes, it can be about covering a scar. Amazing.

Article.title: You picked on the wrong old man: ‘Intimidating’ youths taught a lesson by three-punch pensioner
Article.Description: Respect your elders...or else
Article.MainBody: Matt Payton for Metro.co.uk Friday 12 Jun 2015 11:53 am Just because someone is ofa certain age, it doesnt mean they lack the ability to throw a decent left hook. This is the painful lesson two Russianyouthsfound out to their cost after an exchange on a street corner, which was caught on CCTV. Details of thealtercation remain sketchy, at best, although the spirited OAP clearly takes issue with one ofthe men acting aggressively and lashes out. Within seconds, the impressiveolder gent had knocked two of the mento the floor with only three punches. According to Spanish news site 24 Horas ,their swift demise was instigated after they drunkenlydemanded money from the man outside a bar. We have not been able to independently verify this information and it isnot clear from the video who is at fault,or if the two youths or the man were arrested for their parts in the (one-sided) brawl. Still, after the video went viral in Russia and then worldwide (with 4million views to date)those on the receiving end definitelylearned alesson respect your elders.

Article.title: ‘Voice of Nasa’ Jack King dies at the age of 84
Article.Description: His most famous hour came when he counted down the historic Apollo 11 Mission on 16th July 1969.
Article.MainBody: Nicholas Reilly for Metro.co.uk Friday 12 Jun 2015 11:50 am Jack King was the Voice of NASA (Picture: Alamy) The man known as the voice of Apollo who called the countdown of the first moon landing has died at the age of 84. Jack King counted down hundreds of early rocket launches, but his most famous hour came when he counted down the historic Apollo 11 Mission on 16th July 1969. Lift off, we have a lift-off, he said as the rocket soared into space with Neil Armstrong and Buzz Aldrin on-board. Thirty-two minutes past the hour, lift-off on Apollo 11. Tower cleared. Jack King counted down hundreds of space missions (Picture: Red Huber/Orlando Sentinel/MCT) Speaking in 2009, on the 40th anniversary of the Apollo 11 moon landing, Mr King said that he still enjoyed listening to the recordings of his voice on footage of the historic mission. He died on Thursday at a hospice facility, after suffering congestive heart failure.

Article.title: Whoa. A Boeing plane can now do a near-vertical take off
Article.Description: The plane can be seen performing the bold manoeuvre as it takes off from Washington Airport, en route to the 2015 Paris Airshow.
Article.MainBody: Nicholas Reilly for Metro.co.uk Friday 12 Jun 2015 9:46 am (Picture: Boeing/YouTube) This video shows the amazing moment that a Boeing 787 Dreamliner begins a steep climb into the sky only moments after leaving the tarmac. In the impressive footage, the plane can be seen performing the bold manoeuvre as it takes off from Washington Airport, en route to the 2015 Paris Airshow. At present, 509 of the airliners have been purchased by companies including Vietnam Airways, while Boeing have claimed that the craft are far more economical than previous planes- using 20 percent less fuel. (Picture: Boeing/YouTube) Mike Sinnett, Boeings head of product development explained: If you can save 1 per cent of fuel burn in an aircraft then the airlines are willing to pay for it.

Article.title: British tourist Eleanor Hawkins who posed naked on Malaysian mountain faces jail after pleading guilty
Article.Description: She could face three months in jail.
Article.MainBody: Nicole Morley for Metro.co.uk Friday 12 Jun 2015 9:44 am Ellie angered mountain gods with her bare breasts, apparently (Picture: Rex/ShutterStock) Eleanor Hawkins, the Brit touristwho angered Malaysian mountain gods with her nudity, has pleaded guilty to a public nuisance offence. The 23-year-old admitted her offence during an appearance at Kota Kinabalu Magistrates Court. Eleanor, who was among a group of backpackers, was blamed for triggering an earthquake by posing naked on the sacred peak of Mount Kinabalu. She could face a possible three-month prison sentence or a fine. Eleanor Hawkins, 23, attends court (Picture: Sky News) Eleanor Hawkins stripped naked on Mount Kinabalu in Malaysia (Picture: Sky News) A magnitude-5.9 earthquake struck the 13,400ft-high mountain last Friday, killing 18 people and leaving hundreds more stranded. Sabah state deputy chief minister Joseph Pairin Kitingan blamed the earthquake six days later on travellers showing disrespect to the sacred mountain. The group of 10 tourists stripped naked before taking photos at the peak of Kinabalu on May 30. Miss Hawkinss lawyer Ronny Cham said: She may be charged today or have her bail extended. I dont know. Eleanor Hawkins pleads guilty (Picture: Facebook) Locals believe their nudity angered the sacred mountain gods (Picture: Rex/Shutterstock) Yesterday her father said his daughter was sorry for any offence caused by her actions. He said: She knows what she did was stupid and disrespectful and is very sorry for the offence that she has caused the Malaysian people. He added: We hope that the Malaysian authorities deal with the misdemeanour and not link it to the unfortunate tragic events that occurred the following week. Miss Hawkins, who recently graduated with a masters in aeronautical engineering fromSouthampton University, was in the middle of a gap year travelling around south-east Asia which began in January. Police obtained a court order to detain her and three other westerners for four days while they are investigated for indecent behaviour, Sabah state police chief Jalaluddin Abdul Rahman said.

Article.title: Parents of civil rights leader say she is not black and was actually born caucasian
Article.Description: Hmmm.
Article.MainBody:
Amy Willis for Metro.co.uk Friday 12 Jun 2015 8:51 am "Our daughter is Caucasian" say parents of Spokane NAACP President Rachel Dolezal. pic.twitter.com/6VHxm9v4Wt Taylor Viydo (@KREMTaylor) June 11, 2015 Rachel Dolezal, 37, is a civil rights leader in eastern Washington, on the United States west coast. She is president of a civil liberties organisation called Spokane NAACP, who claim their mission is the enhancement of coloured people to eliminate race-based discrimination. This is Rachel. (Picture: Facebook) She is also part of Spokanespolice oversight commission and is a professorofAfricanstudiesat Eastern Washington University. Rachels bio says: Her passion for civil rights is influenced by her years in Mississippi, where she advocated for equal rights and participated in community development. She also claims tohave been subject to eight documented hate crimes although reports suggest no suspect has ever been identified. But Rachels parentshave come forward to claim that their daughterisnt black. They claim she is passing herself off as an ethnic minorityand she was actuallyborn Caucasian with bothher mother Ruthanne and father Larry beingwhite. Her brother Izalah who is black was adopted, they added. Her father Larry Dolezal said: Shes our birth daughter and were both of European descent. Were puzzled and its very sad. Her parents say her heritage is in fact Czech, Swedish, German and traces of native American. They say their daughter has cut off all communication with them and suspect this is because she does not want to be seen with Caucasian parents. Asked why his daughter might be pretending to be black, he told Buzzfeed : She has over the past 20 years assimilated herself into the African American community through her various advocacy and social justice work, and so that may be part of the answer. Dolezal's parents, who live in Troy, MT, say Rachel has been deceiving people. They want people to know the truth. pic.twitter.com/sS3aiUwD0H Taylor Viydo (@KREMTaylor) June 11, 2015 This man was alsointroduced as her father: When Rachel was asked by a news channelwhether she is African American, she is reported to have giventhis response:
But she maintains that she is black, telling one local newspaper, the Coeur dAlene Press : They can DNA test me if they want to.

Article.title: Malaysia Airlines plane makes emergency landing after catching on fire midflight
Article.Description: The jet was forced to dump fuel.
Article.MainBody: Amy Willis for Metro.co.uk Friday 12 Jun 2015 7:42 am Malaysia Airlines (Picture:Getty Images) A Malaysia Airlines passenger jet has made an emergency landing at Melbourne airport on Friday after a reported engine fire, an official said. Flight 148 from Melbourne to Kuala Lumpur landed without incident or injury, airport spokeswoman Anna Gillett said. Gillett could not confirm media reports that the Airbus A330 returned to Melbourne because of an engine fire. The pilot called an emergency landing and as standard procedure when a pilot calls any sort of emergency landing, emergency personnel are currently on site, Gillett said shortly after the landing. She confirmed that the jet had dumped fuel, saying that was standard procedure before an emergency landing. The troubled state-owned airline lost two airliners in disasters last year. More

Article.title: Man, 73, dies of heat exhaustion after becoming trapped in his car
Article.Description: His dog, who was trapped with him, also died.
Article.MainBody: Oliver Wheaton for Metro.co.uk Thursday 11 Jun 2015 10:21 pm James Rogers and his dog Leia (Picture: Levingstone Funeral Home) An elderly man has died of heat exhaustion along with his dog after they both became trapped in a car. James Rogers, 72, became trapped in his Covette after the battery failed and he was unable to open the electric doors or windows. He wasnt even able to operate the horn on the car, and due to the strong Texas heat he perished along with his dog Leia. The Corvette did have a manual release button in case such a situation occurs, however Mr Rogerswas apparently unaware of it. In a tragic coincidence James had left his phone in the restaurant he was visiting, meaning he was unable to call for help. MORE: Man who trolled police on Facebook gets trolled right back, by the police It was four hours before staff discovered him and called the police, as temperatures climbed as high as32.2C outside. By the time firefighters arrived to try and free him Mr Rogers and his dog were both dead. Several people on Corvette forums have shared stories about being locked in their cars.

Article.title: The design of the fourth and last World Trade Center tower is unveiled
Article.Description: 2 World Trade Center will be 80 storeys tall and is due to open in 2020
Article.MainBody: Matt Payton for Metro.co.uk Thursday 11 Jun 2015 7:39 pm 2 World Trade Center pictured to the right of the Freedom tower (Picture: Caters News) The design of the last tower to be built on the 16-acre Ground Zero plot in New York has been unveiled by its developers. 2 World Trade Center (WTC) will be1,340ft tall with 80 storeys and is due to open for business in September 2021 20 years after the tragic events of 9/11. Its architect, Bjarke Ingels, explained that he wanted to design a building which will both respect the fallen of 9/11 and help rejuvenate the downtown area of New York Hetold Wired :On one hand its about being respectful and about completing the frame around the memorial, and on the other hand its about revitalizing downtown Manhattan and making it a lively place to live and work. MORE: Heres the official 11-year time lapse of World Trade Centers construction This new addition to the plot will only be 28ftshorter than Freedom Tower (Official title: One World Trade Center) if you do not include the latersspire which adds another 424ft. The press release for 2 WTC states:The design of 2 WTC is derived from its urban context at the meeting point between two very different neighbourhoods: the Financial District with its modernist skyscrapers and TriBeCa with its lofts and roof gardens. The design combines the unique qualities of each. 2 World Trade Center will become a large part of the Manhattan skyline (Picture: Caters News) More

Article.title: Driver gets mouthy with police officer, so he smashes his window in
Article.Description: He fought the law...
Article.MainBody: Oliver Wheaton for Metro.co.uk Thursday 11 Jun 2015 5:15 pm Skip to the four-minute-mark for some window smashing A police officer has been filmed smashing in the car window of a motorist who allegedly broke the speed limit. The officer continually asks 49-year-old Scott Richardson to provide his driving licence and insurance documents, however herefuses to give them over, and instead bizarrely asks the officer: As a man what right do you have to pull another man over? Richardsonthen claims that in the State of Texas speeding in and of itself is not illegal. Losing his temper with the mouthy driver, the officer eventually whips out his baton and makes short work of the car window. MORE: Female astrophysicist has a MASSIVE rant about Tim Hunts bulls*** misogyny The standard issue this is you last warning face (Picture: Youtube/SNAFU radio) Richardson, who was reportedly traveling at 50mph in a 40mph zone, claims he has committed no crime because Texas has presumed speed limits, which state a driver can break the speed limit by a small margin provided they are driving safely (however this doesnt excuse you from having to present an officer with your driving licence when requested). He also informs the officer that he is a sovereign citizen a movement of people who claim they are not subjects of any government and therefore do not have to follow their laws. Sadly the officer is having none of it, and after battering through Richardsons window drags him out of the car and arrests him. He was charged withdriving with an invalid license, having expired license plates, failing to present his drivers license upon demand and traffic violations. Addison Police Department have said the officer was absolutely right to break Richardsons window. A spokesperson said: Richardson did not comply with the lawful order from the police officer repeatedly and the officer is permitted to force him to comply. More

Article.title: The science behind why words like moist make you want to vomit
Article.Description: These 23 words should just be removed from the English language now
Article.MainBody: Metro News Reporter for Metro.co.uk Thursday 11 Jun 2015 4:33 pm Words like moist make us want to throw up our small intestine and now science has revealed why. Weare universally grossed out by words that we mentally associate with bodily functions like phlegm and sticky and apparently for 20 per cent of us its as bad as hearing nails down a chalkboard. Psychologists revealed in a new study from Oberlin College and Trinity University in the US on word aversion that its a question of what our brains associate it with. Unsurprisingly, most of the words cameinto the language with a non-offensive meaning, but with our filthy animal instincts weve given them sexual undertones. In fact a load of them are baking terms like sticky, flan, moist, curd, smear, soggy, crusty and my personal favourite yeasty. Theyre mostly disgusting because they make us think of a juicy or gone-off lady garden. Then there are wonderful action wordslike squelch which the study says are just plain phonologically unpleasant. Our poll on Twitter reveals these are the 23 words you hate the most: 1. Moist Man pouring carrot cake mixture into round cake tin 2. Yeasty

Article.title: 5 times Brits abroad shamed us with their holiday antics
Article.Description: Brits have angered more than just mountain gods.
Article.MainBody: Nicole Morley for Metro.co.uk Thursday 11 Jun 2015 4:31 pm Ellie angered mountain gods with her bare breasts, apparently (Picture: Rex/ShutterStock) Mountain gods are currently livid with one Brit girls boobs. Eleanor Hawkins , 23, is being investigated for indecent behaviour after she allegedly posed naked in front of Mount Kinabalu which locals consider sacred. A senior minister in Malaysia has blamed the nude photoshoot for a subsequent earthquake. But Ms Hawkins isnt the first Brit abroad to make our country blush while hitting the headlines, meet fiveother offenders. 1. The Magaluf party girl Oh dear (Picture: Supplied) Who can forget the 21-year-old Irish tourist that performed oral sex on 24 men in a sweaty crowded Magaluf nightclub? Now weve all made mistakes after one too many shandies, but this poor girls misguided antics went viral. Plus, she thought she was going to be rewarded with a holiday in a luxury resort, only to be further humiliated when she was fobbed off with a cocktail of the same name. 2. This couple who just couldnt control themselves Rebecca Blake and Conor McRedmond were jailed after their sex session (Picture: Reuters) In 2013 a couple were arrested for getting jiggy in the back of a Dubai taxi. British businesswoman Rebecca Blake and Irish welder Conor McRedmond, aged 30 and 28 at the time of the incident, were convicting after falling foul of Dubais strict decency laws. They received a two month jail sentence and were later deported. 3. These extremely naughty nuns Pray for forgiveness (Picture: EPA) Rewind back to 2009 and 17 British holidaymakers were arrested for posing as naughty nuns in Greece Although residents of Crete are used to the hustle and bustle of living in a tourist hotspot, those native to Chania on Cretes northern coastline try to preserve local traditions. So its not exactly surprising that they were offended by a bunch of burly blokes in skimpy nun habits and lingerie. MORE: British tourists are complaining about refugees ruining their holidays to Kos and making them feel awkward 4. This bitey gent Fastforward to last summer in Magaluf (Can you see a pattern emerging here?) for this pleasant gentleman who had to be restrained by 10 police officers after he tried to bite other tourists. Instead of topping up his tan, the then 28-year-old man later admitted that hes decided to take a load of drugs instead. Each to their own. 5. This woman who couldnt help butscratch that itch Almost (Picture: Getty) In March, a Londoner very nearly made it back from her trip in Jamaica without any embarrassing incidents. But then she stripped off and performed a sex act on herself mid-flight, British Airways staff confirmed. When police met her at Gatwick Airport, she received a caution for being drunk.
