The telescope is expected to see first light in 2021 and be fully operational by 2024. More

Article.title: Terrorist takes selfie in front of ISIS HQ – US find it and blow it up
Article.Description: Not the brightest moment for the terrorist state.
Article.MainBody: Matt Payton for Metro.co.uk Thursday 4 Jun 2015 9:21 pm ISIS militant carrying the groups flag (Picture: Getty Images) The Islamic States affection for social media is well known and has helped US intelligence officers to find and destroy key terrorist targets. Air Force Gen. Hawk Carlisle, the head of the US Air Combat Command, has recounted a recent incident where a militant took a selfie in front of an Islamic State headquartersboasting of its capabilities. MORE: Isis has a new beard police to enforce shaving ban Intelligence officers at the HurlbertAir Force base in Florida used this dim witted terrorists post to organsie and successfully pull off an airstrike on the facility. General Carlisle told a recent Air Force Association meeting according to Military.com : The guys that were working down out of Hurlburt, theyre combing through social media and they see some moron standing at this command. And in some social media, open forum, bragging about the command and control capabilities for Daesh, ISIL. And these guys go: We got an in. So they do some work, long story short, about 22 hours later through that very building, three [Joint Direct Attack Munitions] take that entire building out.

Article.title: Islamic State fighter’s selfie ‘helps US to bomb group’s headquarters’
Article.Description: The man was described as a moron by a United States Air Force general.
Article.MainBody: Jimmy Nsubuga for Metro.co.uk Thursday 4 Jun 2015 8:42 pm The US flag flutters in the wind beside a B-2 Stealth Bomber (Picture: AFP/Getty Images) This Islamic State (IS) fighter is unlikely to get a commendation anytime soon after the extremist groups headquarters were apparently bombed as a result of a selfie he took outside. The man was described as a moron by United States Air Force (Usaf) general Hawk Carlise, who said the building in Syria was struck by a US B2 Stealth Bomber after experts were able to decipher the location from the social media pictures metadata. They apparently launched the attack 24 hours after spotting the picture earlier this week. MORE: Pupils taken to sex shop by school, parents furious Theyre combing through social media and they see some moron standing at this command, generalCarlisetold military.com. And in some social media, open forum, bragging about the command and control capabilities for Daesh, ISIL. And these guys go: We got an in. So they do some work, long story short, about 22 hours later through that very building, three [Joint Direct Attack Munitions] take that entire building out.

Article.title: Should the Smiler be torn down? Alton Towers passenger tells how he ‘thought he would die’
Article.Description: 'Straight away people were crying and screaming. There was blood everywhere.'
Article.MainBody: MORE: Teenage couple on first date among those injured in Alton Towers Smiler rollercoaster crash Guests said the ride experienced numerous technical problems that day and was constantly stopping and starting. He continued: My mind went completely blank when I saw it was going to crash. I remember the impact. It was just massive and rocked the whole carriage. Straight away people were crying and screaming. There was blood everywhere. One person had it all over his face. I thought, oh God, someone must have died. The underside of one carriage is buckled after the impact (Picture: PA) Hesuffered severe bruising in the incident but escaped with minor injuries. He added: I really think they should tear that ride down because I can see it happening again in the future. Its not safe. The Smiler has been plagued with problems since it opened in May 2013. Just two months later it was closed amid safety fears visitorsqueuing raised the alarm when they saw a piece of metal fall to the ground. Then, in November 2013, it was closed again after a wheel came loose and hit people in the front row. An air ambulance lands at the scene (Picture: SWNS) The four seriously injured in the crash have now been named. Joe Pugh, 18, of Barnsley, who is reported to have broken both legs, was on a first date with Leah Washington. Leah and Joe (Picture: Ben Lack) The other two crash victims who suffered serious leg injuries have been named asDaniel Thorpe, 27, of Buxton and Vicky Balch. Vicky Balch (Picture: PA) Daniel Thorpe (Picture: PA) The park has been closed since Tuesday and will remain closed while an investigation is carried out. It is believed the park is losing 500,000 every day it stays shut. More

Article.title: Pupils taken to sex shop by school, parents furious
Article.Description: They were taken to Smitten Kitten.
Article.MainBody: It is not known if the kids enjoyed the trip (Picture: Getty) But Lynn Flod, whose 11 and 13-year-old daughters attended, said parents werent informed of the outing. He said: I just struggled to think that I wasnt involved in that. Its just a major breach of trust. But, Starri Hedges, director of Gaia Democratic School, explained she wanted to provide a safe and welcoming environment for students to learn about human sexual behavior. She said: What I saw happening on our trip, I thought it was beautiful because kids could talk to these sex educators without any shame, without any fear.

Article.title: Girl, 13, commits suicide days after ‘father cuts off her hair and posts shaming video on YouTube’
Article.Description: The video shows Isabel Laxamana's hair on the floor after it was allegedly cut by her dad.
Article.MainBody: Follow us Girl, 13, commits suicide days after father cuts off her hair and posts shaming video onYouTube Ollie McAteer for Metro.co.uk Thursday 4 Jun 2015 6:00 pm A 13-year-old girl threw herself off an overpass just days after a shaming video was posted online by her father. Isabel Laxamana, fromTacoma, Washington, US, died in hospital on Friday May 29. King County Medical Examiners office ruled the death as suicide. Days before, a 15-second video emerged online of Isabel standing in a room with some of her hair on the floor. Her father says: The consequences of getting messed up, man, you lost all that beautiful hair, was it worth it? A Facebook page has been set up for Isabel (Picture: YouTube) No, she responds quietly. How many times did I warn you? he asks. A lot, she replies. It has been widely reported that the video was uploaded to YouTube by her dad as a way of shaming her for her actions, which are unknown. A Facebook page has now been launched called Justice for Isabel. The description explains it wants to raise awareness of parent shaming. For emotional support contact Samaritans anonymouslyon 08457 909 090. More

Article.title: Baby twins survive after drunk driver smashes into their buggy
Article.Description: 'When it hit them, the stroller went spinning through the air and one of the babies landed very near to the car's rear wheel.'
Article.MainBody: Harry Readhead for Metro.co.uk Thursday 4 Jun 2015 4:31 pm The babies buggy was launched into the air (Picture: CEN) Two baby twins in Crimea remarkably survivedafter a driver ten times over the limit ploughed into their buggy. A mother was pushing her one-year-old children through apark in Sevastopol when an out-of-control Lada came hurtling towards them and slammed into the pram,launching it into the air. Incredibly, the babies survived the impact. Their hysterical mother was seen cradling her bloody and crying children in disbelief. MORE: Brave mother of baby born with rare condition speaks of difficulty bonding with her son The driver was ten times over the limit (Picture: CEN) I was going for a walk when I saw this car suddenly go onto the grass and head towards the mum and her children, said Marina Matveeva, 54, who saw the incident. When it hit them, the stroller went spinning through the air and one of the babies landed very near to the cars rear wheel. The driver was about to reverse, but the mother screamed so loudly he stopped. If he hadnt [stopped] he would have surely crushed the baby. She threw her body over theirs to protect them. MORE: The only hug she ever had with her baby: Mum releases heart-breaking pic to raise awareness of killer bug One of the babies landed behind the cars rear wheel (Picture: CEN) Police arrived moments later and questioned the driver as paramedics rushed the babies to hospital, where they were treated for minor injuries. The driver claimed he was trying to avoid an oncoming car, but officers quickly found he was more than ten times over the legal alcohol limit. He faces charges of drinking and driving as well as endangering the lives of others.

Article.title: Woman who was ‘beaten, strangled and raped’ by crew member is suing cruise company
Article.Description: The unidentified woman suffered the vicious assault a\t the hands of a Holland America employee.
Article.MainBody: Pujayasa, a 29-year-old employee originally from Indonesia, pleaded guilty to the incident which took place on Valentines Day last year, and was sentenced to 30 years in prison. Now the married victim is suing the cruise company for negligence. Her attorney John H Hickey told MailOnline the company were grossly negligence for allowingPujayasa to have a key which accessed all cabins. He added: To top it off, the cruise lines system is that when the other passengers dial 911 they get the front desk, not security, and the front desk responds to the scene some 45 minutes to an hour later and does not even have access to the cabin? If this is not the definition of outrageous, I dont know what is. Ketut Pujayasa (Picture: Broward County Sheriffs Office) In a statement Holland America said: To our knowledge, no incident like this has occurred before in our companys 142-year history. It is our highest priority to ensure the safety and security of our guests. We do strongly refute the statement that emergency calls to our staff related to this situation were given anything but the highest priority.

Article.title: There’s more cocaine in London sewers than any other city in Europe
Article.Description: Meet in the sewers at 7pm.
Article.MainBody: Ollie McAteer for Metro.co.uk Thursday 4 Jun 2015 3:57 pm Meet in the sewers at 7pm (Picture Getty) London has the highest concentration of cocaine in sewage in Europe, research shows. Experts said the UK capital was slightly ahead of Amsterdam for the amount of the drug in waste water. The EUs drug agency said the average daily concentration of cocaine in London sewage was 737mg per 1,000 people in 2014. This was the highest level found in the analysis of more than 50 cities. However, the capital fell below Amsterdam in the list when taking into account weekend samples only. Not worth it(Picture: Thames Water) The survey showed London had the fourth highest daily concentration of ecstasy. However, no traces were recorded in the city for the other three drugs tested cannabis, methamphetamine and amphetamine. The European Monitoring Centre for Drugs and Drug Addiction said waste water analysis is a rapidly developing scientific discipline with the potential for monitoring real-time population-level trends in illicit drug use.

Article.title: Alton Towers Smiler rollercoaster crash victim who ‘broke both legs’ speaks out for first time
Article.Description: The theme park is believed to be losing £500,000 a day.
Article.MainBody: MORE: Law firm accused of trying to promote business with Alton Towers crash Among those on board was Vanisha Singh, 29, who was in the second row of the carriage with her mother Chanda, 49, and her sister Meera, 26. She told the Sun there had been technical difficulties moments before they embarked on the ride, as several test cars were sent ahead of them. We finally went up and were kept at the top for ten or 15 minutes chatting, joking that we were the guinea pigs, she said. The metal safety bar smashed into our legs. There was loads of screaming. I felt a burning sensation in my pelvis, and back and neck pain. It was terrifying. There was blood all over the floor because it was pouring out of their legs in the carriage and dropping down. The doctors and firemen were covered in blood as they scaled the scaffolding to treat the guys on the front row. An Air Ambulance leaves Alton Towers Resort earlier this week (Picture:Christopher Furlong/Getty Images) Alton Towers remains closed for the third day, racking up losses potentially worth millions of pounds as health and safety inspectors comb the site in Staffordshire for clues to what caused the rollercoaster crash. The theme park is believed to be losing500,000 a day. It will remain closed on Friday as well. Neil Craig, head of operations for HSE in the Midlands, said that a specialist team of inspectors were at the scene making inquiries. He added: Our role is to establish the facts. We will want to determine that those responsible for operating this ride have done what the law requires. We will also ensure that if there are any lessons to be learned, they are shared as soon as possible. Although the investigation is in its early stages, we will take action to protect the public if we uncover evidence that could affect the safety of other rides at the park or elsewhere. The dramatic scene on Tuesday at Alton Towers (Picture: PA) An Alton Towers spokeswoman said: :Following The Smiler incident onJune 2, Alton Towers will stay closed on Friday June 5. The Health and Safety Executive remain on site and Alton Towers is co-operating fully with their investigation. We also continue to communicate with the families of all those involved. Anybody with pre-booked tickets for Alton Towers tomorrow will be able to visit Thorpe Park, Chessington World of Adventures, Warwick Castle or Legoland Windsor as an alternative. More

Article.title: Driver squirts petrol into seven-year-old boy’s mouth
Article.Description: Seven-year-old Jamal was sitting by one of the pumps when the aggressive assault took place.
Article.MainBody: Oliver Wheaton for Metro.co.uk Thursday 4 Jun 2015 3:03 pm The driver squirts the deadly liquid into Jamals mouth (Picture: berwachungskamera) An driver assaulting a young boy by squirting petrol into his mouth has been caught on camera. Seven-year-old Jamal was sitting by one of the pumps at a petrol station in Cologne when a 29-year-old driver pulled up. A flustered Jamal didnt have time to get out of the way so he just moved his legs instead, allowing the man to drive right up to the pump. For no apparent reason the driver then gets out and grabs Jamals face before squirting petrol into his mouth. Jamal quickly runs away from the man, who went on to fill up his car before paying and leaving allegedly laughing at Jamal as he did so.

Article.title: Just a guy playing the Beatles while having brain surgery
Article.Description: Anthony Kulkamp Dias, 33, played six songs throughout his nine hour operation
Article.MainBody: Matt Payton for Metro.co.uk Thursday 4 Jun 2015 2:27 pm While having a tumour removed from his brain, the patient providedhis surgeons an impressive soundtrack including a cover of Yesterday by the Beatles. Anthony Kulkamp Dias, 33, played various some other Brazilian country songs and even a tune of his own invention during the nine-hour surgery. MORE: Haunting pictures of brain surgerys first ever patients are revealed Mr Kulkamp Dias said: I played six songs at determined moments. My right hand was a bit weaker because that was the side that they were operating on. So I stopped and rested. I was interspersing songs and talking with them. MORE: Former X Factor finalist Chris Maloney has spent 60K on cosmetic surgery This was no publicity stunt for the Nossa Senhora de Conceio Hospital in the southern Brazilian state of Santa Catarina. Having the bank worker play his guitar and talk to surgical staff meant that the doctors wouldbe able to check that his ability for cognitive function wasnot damaged. Daily Mail reported that the hospitals spokesperson said: While it surprised everyone, the surgery was performed. Cerebral monitoring important to prevent injuries that occur in the sensory, motor and speech areas occurred during the procedure.

Article.title: Doctors use basil to lure out a worm that’s been living in a boy’s eye for a month
Article.Description: Apologies if you're eating.
Article.MainBody: Search Metro Follow us Doctors use basil to lure out a worm thats been living in a boys eye for amonth Nicole Morley for Metro.co.uk Thursday 4 Jun 2015 2:26 pm The worm just couldnt resist the tastyherb. If youre eating, then take this gentle warning to put the snacks down. Medics have used basil to tempt out a worm that was living in a boys eye for four weeks. Doctors at the National Childrens Hospital in Lima, Peru, treated Jamie, a 17-year-old boy who had a swollen and sore left eye. They quickly discovered that a three centimetre worm had set up home in his eye socket. It got there after he was bitten by a mosquito while sleeping, so were wearing an eyemaskevery night until the end of time. Jamie was bitten on the eye (Picture: CEN) MORE: 10 phobias you didnt know existed Just when you thought things couldnt get any worse for Jamie, Ophthalmologist Caroline Marchena claims the creature was positioned near a particularly sensitive part of the face from where infections can easily spread to the brain. She said: The location of the worm from the lower lid, which was getting bigger, made the risks increase because the youths tissue was swelling in an area close to the sinuses thats close to the delicate part which is the triangle of death [danger triangle of the face]. As soon as the peckish worm poked his head out in search of the basil, doctors used tweezers to remove it completely, which is lucky because nobody wants anything all up in their triangle of death, right? Jamieis expected to make a full recovery, we cant say the same for the worm. The worm measured over an inch long (Picture: CEN) More

Article.title: Mum drops toddler off balcony for dad to catch, just to avoid using stairs
Article.Description: The man taking the video claimed there was no emergency or any reason to drop the child off the balcony.
Article.MainBody: Oliver Wheaton for Metro.co.uk Thursday 4 Jun 2015 2:00 pm A woman was filmed risking her toddlers life by throwing him off a balcony into the arms of his father, simply to save her a journey down the stairs. Concerned neighbourAkbota Rynzhanova capturedthe unbelievable moment, and claimed there was no emergency or any good reason to put the childs life at risk. The little boy, who is only 18-months-old, is dangled over the balcony by his arms before finally being releasedto be caught byhis fatherstanding below. Akbota, who shot the footage near his home inAstana City, the capital of Kazakhstan, said: How dumb can you be, to think of throwing the baby from the balcony? Im shocked. The video was put on Facebook where the actions of the parents were widely condemned, being called irresponsible. However other commenterspointed out that the baby was laughing in the video, and didnt seem to be in any distress.

Article.title: Amazing synchronised videos show whether water swirls differently across the world
Article.Description: The videos could be more interesting than the answer.
Article.MainBody: Jimmy Nsubuga for Metro.co.uk Thursday 4 Jun 2015 1:16 pm Syncronized videos test whether Coriolis Effect is real (Picture: YouTube/Veritasium) A set of videos that test ifwater drains in a different way depending on what hemisphere youre in are probably more interesting than the actual answer. If youve ever wanted to know whether water flushes in a different direction on the other side of the world today is your lucky day. Dr Derek Muller from Veritasium and Destin Sandlin from Smarter Every Day havecome up with the answer. MORE: Digital drug brain cap makes you feel like you are high But whats probably more impressive is the two friends have done it in the most ingenious way possible by syncronising two YouTube videos. Its a bit fidgety at first but once you line them lined up its almost flawless, with the two men taking you on a journey from the United States to Australia. MORE: Flight attendant banned from serving customers over Islamophobic incident Dr Muller and Mr Sandlin eventually reach the conclusion the Coriolis Effect is real but doesnt necessarily show up in your toilet or sink because of other variables that influence the spin. They demonstrate this by using two paddling pools and placing dye in them, which shows Earths rotation does actually determine the northern and southern hemisphere water flow direction. Thats great and all, but the most exciting thing for us was watching the two men seemingly jump into each others videos as a result of faultless synchronisation. To get the best experience view the videos here .If you do clickthem below be sure to sync them.

Article.title: Qatar defy reports and claim ‘not a single worker has died’ in World Cup construction
Article.Description: They said the 'figures have absolutely no basis in fact' in response to reports that 1,200 migrant workers have died.
Article.MainBody: Oliver Wheaton for Metro.co.uk Thursday 4 Jun 2015 12:42 pm Migrant workers are allegedly forced to live and work in poor conditions (Picture: PA) Qatar has flat out denied that any workers have died working on construction projects for the World Cup. Many reports coming out of the country, which is due to host the 2022 Fifa World Cup, claim that more than 1,000 migrant construction workers have died in the building projects for the football tornament. London Loves Business published a report from the International Trade Union Confederation (ITUC)claiming the number was as high as 1,200 deaths, far more than the eightworkers who died in the run up to the 2014Fifa World Cup in Brazil. Since publishing their report officials from Qatar have hit back, claiming that not one worker has died in their construction projects. These figures have absolutely no basis in fact. After almost 5 million man-hours of work, there have been no fatal industrial accidents on World Cup projects, they said in an email to London Loves Business. MORE: A woman is putting up posters searching for her one-night-stand* They go on to blame any deaths in the million migrant workers currently living and working in the country on cardiovascular disease, which they claim the workers would have succumbed to even if they remained in their home countries. Just to ram the point home, they finish the email with: To be clear: there have been no fatalities on World Cup projects in Qatar. The2022 World Cup has been surrounded by scandal, with fans claiming that a desert climate in an alcohol free country is not suitable for an international sports competition. Former Fifa president Sepp Blatter recently stepped down from the position following the arrests of seven top Fifa officials and allegations of widespread corruption within the organisation. Former Fifa president Sepp Blatter(Picture:MICHAEL BUHOLZER/AFP/Getty Images) More

Article.title: Flight attendant ‘banned’ from serving customers over ‘Islamophobic’ incident
Article.Description: A passenger said the attendant refused to give her an unopened can of Diet Coke because she was Muslim.
Article.MainBody: Quran Weekly (@QuranWeekly) May 30, 2015 Her description of the incident on her Facebook page on Friday led to news articles and a Twitter campaign supporting her. United had initially described the incident as a misunderstanding but have now relented and said itsemployee will no longer serve United customers, although it wasnt clearif she had been sacked. Ahmad held a press conference on Wednesday (Picture: AP) While United did not operate the flight, Ms. Ahmad was our customer and we apologize to her for what occurred on the flight, United spokesman Charles Hobart said. Northwestern University chaplain Ahmad, who held a new conference on Wednesday, accused United of trivialising the issue at first. [This is] not about me or a soda can, its about systemic injustice, she told the Guardian .

Article.title: Will you die in the next five years? This website can tell you, apparently
Article.Description: You have to be between the ages of 40 and 70 for the test to work accurately - because as we all know, young people are invincible.
Article.MainBody: Oliver Wheaton for Metro.co.uk Thursday 4 Jun 2015 10:11 am It cant predict HOW you will die, however(Picture: Getty) Forget those horoscopes, the internet is the only soothsayer you need now. A new online tool has been launched which claims to be able to determine the likelihood of you dying over the next five years. The UbbLE risk calculator will ask you a series of questions and use the information to estimateboth your Ubble age and your risk of death in the following half-decade. You have to be between the ages of 40 and 70 for the test to work accurately because as we all know, young people are invincible. The questions start off by inquiring abouthow many people you live with, if you have suffered a death in the family recently and how much you walk/drive. MORE: Law firm accused of trying to promote business with Alton Towers crash Then things get a little bit more direct. One question asks ifa doctor has ever told you that you have diabetes?, while another is: Has a doctor ever told you that you havecancer?. Were not physicians, but even we can see how this might affect your health over the coming five years. As a test we created a fictional 47-year-old man with a wife a two kids he also owns one car and has recently suffered a death in the family, but doesnt smoke and keeps in good health. UbbLE predicted this gentleman had a 0.6 per cent chance of dying in the next five years, and that his Ubble age was actually 33-years-old. Bad news for that red guy (Picture: Ubble.co.uk) It also informed us that out of 100 men of the same age who gave similar answers only one of them would die in the next five years, statistically. The website makes it predictions based onscientific research carried out by Andrea GannafromKarolinska Institutet Erik IngelssonfromUppsala University, as well as using data from the UK Biobank. Dr Ingelsson said: In general, if your Ubble age is higher than your actual age, it could raise concerns and provide some incentive for lifestyle change.

Article.title: Boy swallows ghost chilli pepper and does not handle it well
Article.Description: So young, so impressionable.
Article.MainBody: Ollie McAteer for Metro.co.uk Wednesday 3 Jun 2015 10:41 pm So young, so impressionable lets make him eatone of the worlds hottest chillies for lolz! To everyones amazement, the American boy swallows the entire ghost pepper. Thats400 times hotter than Tabasco sauce, and its so powerful that in 2009scientists at Indias Defence Research and Development Organisationmooted plans to use it in hand grenades,just to give you an idea of its intensity. Anyway, his face turns purple and he cries. Dont swallow it!! someone is heard shouting. Yeah, poor timing.

Article.title: London’s first ‘cannabis’ pop-up restaurant will open for two days only this month
Article.Description: There's only one place to go if you get the munchies this summer.
Article.MainBody: Ollie McAteer for Metro.co.uk Wednesday 3 Jun 2015 10:08 pm Got the munchies? (Picture: Getty/metro) Not real cannabis, but its the closest legal thing to it in London this year. A pop-up restaurant with food inspired by marijuana is set to open for two days at the end of June. Cannabistro is offering a 40 four-course mealdelicately designed to recreate the careful ritual of getting high. Weed will be replaced by mackerel flakes and guests invited to roll up their own edible joint. Yummy. Were not sure where this niche restaurant will spark up but our moneysin Shoreditch, right next to that cereal place.

Article.title: Dinner lady gets fired for giving free lunches to kids without money
Article.Description: Della Curry said she'd do it all again in a heartbeat.
Article.MainBody: Ollie McAteer for Metro.co.uk Wednesday 3 Jun 2015 9:21 pm A primary school dinner lady has been fired for giving free lunches to kids without money. Mother of two Della Curry lost her job atDakota Valley Elementary School in Aurora, Denver, but said shed do it all again in a heartbeat. She told CBS Denver: I had a first grader in front of me, crying, because she doesnt have enough money for lunch. Yes, I gave her lunch. Any pupil who forgets their lunch and fails to qualify for a subsidised one gets a burger bun with a piece of cheese on it Mrs Curry said thats not enough and the rules need to change. Cherry Creek School District said in a statement: The law does not require the school district to provide the meal to children who have forgotten their lunch money, that is a district decision. Mrs Curry said she would do it all again (Picture: CBS Denver) According to our practice, we provide hot meals to students the first three times they forget their lunch money and charge their parents accounts. The fourth time, we provide a cheese sandwich and milk. The district has worked to keep lunch prices low and still meet the federal nutrition requirements. The costs of our lunch programme are not covered by the prices we charge. At the end of the year, any unpaid accounts revert back to the general fund which also covers instruction, security, building maintenance and overall operations.

Article.title: WTF? Spice rack snake eats kitchen egg, scares the bejesus out of family
Article.Description: *Blinks* *rubs eyes*
Article.MainBody: Ollie McAteer for Metro.co.uk Wednesday 3 Jun 2015 8:05 pm So, this snake just emerged from a spice rack and started eating an egg in true double-U tee eff fashion. The reptile randomly appeared in the North Carolina, US, home on Sunday scaring the bejesus out of this family. Heres what happened Laura Neff's 'excitement on Sunday' full story It was a run of the mill Sunday afternoon here on our little farmette, until a noise in the kitchen made us look upat the spice cabinetwhere THIS was descending toward a basket of fresh eggs on the counter! To answer your questions: Rat Snake. Non-venomous, beneficial due to their penchant for eating rodents and (OUTSIDE) eggs. It got in through a hole in our laundry room floor, which is now covered by a VERY heavy concrete block and which will soon be permanently plugged. Yes, we let it finish the egg. Using two brooms, a whole lot of patience, nudging, and encouraging, we finally convinced it that going out the open window was a MUCH better option than slithering away behind the fridge! As soon as we could get its bulk under the brooms, we hefted it out the window, and off it went to the rest of its evening. And then we drank. (Kidding! okay, sort of. Lol!) Alls well that ends well, butJEEZ!!! More

Article.title: How did a boy survive for 42 minutes underwater?
Article.Description: His survival was heralded as an 'exceptional event' and 'miraculous'.
Article.MainBody: Harry Readhead for Metro.co.uk Wednesday 3 Jun 2015 4:19 pm Last week, we wrote of how a boy survived 42 minutes underwater after jumping into the Naviglio Canal west of Milan, Italy. His survival was heralded as an exceptional event by doctors and miraculous by the boys mother. But how did he survive for so long? The team at On Demand News think they have the answer. MORE: Boy survives after 42 minutes underwater The teenager jumped from a bridge into the Naviglio Canal (Picture: Google) When a persons head is submerged in waterthey will automatically hold their breath and their heart rate will slow down as a result of the human diving reflex. Blood is pulled away from the extremities to the vital organs, which in turn helps circulation between the heart and brain. That is undoubtedlypartly to thank. But a second, more controversial theory, reports ODNs Claire Lomas, is more likely to be responsible for the 14-year-olds recovery and it lies in something called the selective brain cooling hypothesis. The quicker the brain cools, the more likely it is to survive. The hypothesis posits that if youre immersed in cold water as the boy in question was the body conserves carbon dioxide, the blood vessels in the brain dilate and more cool blood enters the brain, which keeps you alive.

Article.title: Does London have the balls to cap rent like Berlin just did?
Article.Description: With the London housing crisis spiralling out of control, will law makers follow Berlin's lead?
Article.MainBody: Oliver Wheaton for Metro.co.uk Wednesday 3 Jun 2015 4:01 pm So much choice, so little money (Picture: SHAUN CURRY/AFP/Getty Images) Its the one song every Londoner is eager to sing along to rent in the UKs capital is extortionate. While everyone who doesnt have a job which keeps them in the office until 9pm each day is slowly pushed out to zone 5, its no secret that London is becoming a city that you can only live in and enjoy if you are fairly wealthy. Berlin, the counter-culture capital of Europe has taken steps to deal with the problem faced by cities around the world and introduced a rent cap on landlords. Landlords in Germanys capital city will no longer be able to increase rent by more than 10 per cent over the localaverage. The legislation was put in place after fears that the large numbers of people moving to the city was giving landlords the opportunity overcharge residents, especially newcomers, similar to situations in London and Paris. MORE: First wolves to be born in Britain in 300 years Reiner Wild, managing director of the Berlin Tenants Association, told the Guardian : We dont want a situation like in London or Paris. The reality in Paris or London is that people with low income have to live in the further-out districts of the city. The has prompted calls for London to introduce its own rent caps in order to allow lower income people to reside closer to the city centre.

Article.title: This man just made a McProposal (and it’s as bad as it sounds)
Article.Description: Ten points if you guess how his girlfriend responded.
Article.MainBody: Harry Readhead for Metro.co.uk Wednesday 3 Jun 2015 3:54 pm Now were sure there may be some people that find it charming, but as a rule of thumb, dont, for goodness sake, propose with a box of McDonalds Chicken Nuggets. If youd like to know why, take a look at this womans reaction. Joseph thought it might be romantic to ask out his girlfriend at the same place where they endedtheir first date: McDonalds. MORE: This basketball proposal is everything She does not look impressed. (Picture: YouTube/Joseph Ann) At the time, Josephwrites, his girlfriend joked about how 10 years down the road I would probably propose to her in a chicken nugget box. Bearing that in mind, wedo have some sympathy for Joseph, and we think hes a good sport for posting the video for all to see on YouTube, but really, the whole thing is a disaster. And, of course, it makes for utterly cringeworthy viewing. The good news, however, is that although his girlfriend turned his proposaldown, the pair are still together.

Article.title: Going on holiday this summer? Good luck if you’re going through any of these airports
Article.Description: Don't got to Nice. Ever.
Article.MainBody: Ollie McAteer for Metro.co.uk Wednesday 3 Jun 2015 2:42 pm The horror (Picture: PA) Look at this picture. It feels you with dread. Airports are the worst thing about going away. The sheer volume of people, the luggage smashing into you, THE DELAYS. Flightright.co.uk has put together a list of the worst countries, cities and airports for delays and cancellations so we can avoid them this summer. If youre already going, unlucky. Data was collected from June 1 to August 31 2014. Top 5 destinations with the most delayed or cancelled flights by city Nice 64%

Article.title: Chinese children taken on tours of luxury villas to ‘stimulate’ their desire to be rich and successful
Article.Description: What would Mao say?
Article.MainBody: Follow us Chinese children taken on tours of luxury villas to stimulate their desire to be rich andsuccessful Harry Readhead for Metro.co.uk Wednesday 3 Jun 2015 2:38 pm A fun day out for all the family. (Picture: henan.china.com) As a parent, how do you encourage your child to want to be successful? Do you tell them to follow their dreams? That hard work isa virtue? No. You take them on a tour of some luxury villas because, the logic goes, it will show them that beingsuccessful means being rich and being rich means you can buya nice villa. Around 50 families visit per week at some resorts (Picture: henan.china.com) That is what Chinese media reports that parents in the country aredoing. A growing number are taking their children on special tours of villas worth hundreds of thousands of pounds to stimulate a desire to become successful and wealthy. MORE: Man creates brilliant five Olympic rings bike to tour China on The trips are supposed to stimulate the desire to be rich (Picture: henan.china.com) For example, companies like Heming Island Resort and Spa in Qingyuan, Guangdong Province, offer these trips every weekend, with 50 families on average coming eachweek, Youth.cn reports. During the course of the visit, parents will tell their children that wealth is a sign of success and working hard during school will allow them to buy luxury homes like the ones on show and join thesocial elite. What would Mao say?

Article.title: This is what happened when a man asked homeless people for a dollar
Article.Description: 'I need a dollar, dollar, dollar is what I need...'
Article.MainBody: Harry Readhead for Metro.co.uk Wednesday 3 Jun 2015 12:06 pm Have you got Aloe Blaccs I Need a Dollar out of your head yet? When Kenyon Salowalked through the town ofBoulder, Colorado, asking homeless people for a dollar, he was surprised to find that almost all of them produced a billand handed it over with no questions asked. But the kindness of these people who say that to receive a dollar from a member of the public is everything did not go unrewarded. With a little sleight of hand, health worker Mr.Salo, 42, changed the dollar bill into a 20 and handed it straight back. Kenyon Salo was amazed to find how readily homeless people would hand over a dollar (Picture: YouTube/Caters TV) Thats impressive! says one man. That will put a smile on anyones face! Dude, that was awesome! anotherwoman tells Mr. Salo. Mr. Salo is the founder of The Bucket List Life , a community that works together to check off new experiences now rather than later.

Article.title: Woman heads out on round-the-world trip after three near-death experiences in as many weeks
Article.Description: Megan Sullivan set out on the trip with her boyfriend who she had only been dating for two weeks.
Article.MainBody: MORE: Mafia boss freed from 14 year jail sentence because he is allergic to prison The short time span meant they only spent two nights at each destination, and mostly slept on planes, spending only five nights in hotels. I had the lowest expectations for the Great Wall but it was the best experience, said Megan, from San Francisco. It was a beautiful day and Bejing was my favourite city too. Machu Picchu blew me away as well. Japan is considering toilets in lifts for emergency situations In total the pair visited Christ the Redeemer in Brazil, Chichen Itza in Mexico, The Lost City of Petra in Jordan, Machu Picchu in Peru, the Colosseum in Italy and the Taj Mahal in India and the Great Wall in China. However it wasnt smooth sailing throughout the whole trip, as the pair accidentally only gave themselves seven hours in Mexico meaning a rushed trip to the Chichen Itza temple. The intense travelling did not throw a spanner in the works of their budding relationship. Megansaid: Were just the same kind of people, we get on with it. The couple are still going strong andlast weekend travelled to Amsterdam, Istanbul and Rome in just four days. More

Article.title: Mafia boss freed from 14 year jail sentence because he is ‘allergic to prison’
Article.Description: He reportedly became depressed because his life of crime had led him to develop an aversion to men in uniform and to prison bars.
Article.MainBody: Oliver Wheaton for Metro.co.uk and Joel Taylor for Metro.co.uk Wednesday 3 Jun 2015 10:01 am Giulio Lampadawas deemed allergic to prison (Picture: CEN) A Mafia boss has come up with what might be the greatest get out of jail free excuse ever he is allergic to prison. Senior Mafia Giulio Lampada, 44,was jailed for 14 years for his role in the organised crime unit of the Condella clan. However he hasbeen allowed to go home after serving just seven months asdozens of doctors ruled he was incompatible with prison. He reportedly lost 22lb due to only eating fruit and light snacks and never left his cell in the Liguria region of Italy. Lampada, who was arrested in November 2011, could not even be transferred toa psychiatric ward, as it was believed he would not fare well in that environment either. MORE: First wolves to be born in Britain in 300 years He reportedly became depressed because his life of crime had led him to develop an aversion to men in uniform and to prison bars. A judge in Milan allowed Lampada to move back to his villa on the outskirts of the city under house arrest. What horrors took place in this room covered in blood? There, hell be reunited with his wife and three daughters so he can recover. His lawyer, Giuseppe Nardo, said: During his time in jail he never left his cell. He even needed help to go to the bathroom. Tony Soprano would be spinning in his fictional grave (wait did he die in the end?). More

Article.title: The Pentagon accidentally sent anthrax to Australia and Canada
Article.Description: Accidents happen, ay lads?
Article.MainBody: Nicole Morley for Metro.co.uk Wednesday 3 Jun 2015 9:00 am Whoopsie! (Picture: Getty ) The Pentagon sent live anthrax to three countries, 12 US states and the District of Columbia. In a spectacular boo-boo US officials accidentally sent live samples of the deadly bacteria-based disease to an army base in South Korea and three laboratories in Canada. They also managed to ship anthrax to28 government facilities acrossAmerica from the Army lab in Utah. The spores should have been renderedinactive through irradiation, but for some reason that didnt happen. A senior Defence Department official told USA Today that no casualties have been infected. MORE: Council accidentally plants marijuana in city centre flowerbeds But up to four Americans and 22 military personnel in South Koreas Osan air base are currently receiving preventative treatment, according to BBC. America also sent anthrax to Australia in 2008, so we doubt theyre expecting many Christmas cards at the Pentagon come December. Accidents happen (Picture: Reuters)

Article.title: Yves Saint Laurent ad banned for featuring ‘unhealthily underweight’ model
Article.Description: The model has a visible rib cage and extremely thin legs.
Article.MainBody: Ollie McAteer for Metro.co.uk Wednesday 3 Jun 2015 12:01 am The ad was banned because the model is too thin, said the ASA (Picture: PA) An Yves Saint Laurent (YSL) ad has been banned for featuring a model with a visible rib cage and knees and thighs of a similar width. The ad, which appeared in Elle UK magazine, featured a black and white photo of a woman described by the Advertising Standards Authority (ASA) as unhealthily underweight. A reader complained that the ad was irresponsible for using a model who appeared to be toothin. The ASA said YSL indicated that they did not agree with the complainants view that the model was unhealthily thin but did not provide a detailed response. Elle UK told the watchdog it had no comment to make on the complaint. The ASA said the models pose and the lighting drew particular focus to her chest, where her rib cage was visible and appeared prominent, and to her legs, where her thighs and knees appeared a similar width. MORE: Drug dealers ask prison for mercy but all 34 are executed instead It said: We therefore considered that the model appeared unhealthily underweight in the image and concluded that the ad was irresponsible. It ruled that the ad must not appear again in its current form, adding: We told the advertisers to ensure that the images in their ads were prepared responsibly. YSL declined to comment on the ruling. Earlier this year, a campaign for the YSL perfume Black Opium was cleared by the ASA following complaints that it glamorised and trivialised drug use and addiction.

Article.title: Terrified cat thrown into washing machine by evil kids
Article.Description: Sickening.
Article.MainBody: Ollie McAteer for Metro.co.uk Tuesday 2 Jun 2015 10:25 pm The terrified cat is heard screaming in panic (Picture: CEN) Sickening footage has emerged showing teenagers throwing a cat into a washing machine and turning it on. The terrified moggy is heard screaming in panic as water starts pouring in. The animal is then hurled around inside for a few seconds before the evil kids decide enough is enough. They open the door and water is seen gushing out as the soaked cat frantically tries to escape. Cruel kids laugh as the washing machine goes into a spin cycle (Picture: CEN) During the cruel the video one person is heard saying: He is trying to open the door. Is there enough air? Nothing will happen in two minutes.

Article.title: Sepp Blatter resignation: 5 key things you need to know about the shock decision
Article.Description: Could England host the 2018 World Cup?
Article.MainBody: Ollie McAteer for Metro.co.uk Tuesday 2 Jun 2015 7:09 pm Blatter announced his shock decision today (Picture: Ennio Leanza/Keystone/AP) Fifa President Sepp Blatter will resign from soccers governing body amid a widening corruption scandal and has promised to call for fresh elections to choose a successor. Heres what you need to know: 1. Explosive letter Jack Warner is alleged to have been involved in a $10million bribe (Picture: Reuters) Blatters shock decision comes on the same day a letter emerged appearing to contradict claims his right-hand man was not involved in the payment of an alleged $10million bribe. The letter implicates former Fifa vice-president Jack Warner in an alleged corrupt bid to secure the 2010 World Cup in South Africa. 2. Standing down for the good of football (Picture:Getty Images) During his resignation, Blatter said: I have thoroughly considered my presidency and about the last 40 years in my life, these years were closely related to Fifa. I decided to stand again for election for the good of football, but my mandate does not appear to be supported by everybody. The elections are closed but the challenges we are facing have not. Fifa needs profound restructuring. 3. New president to be announced ASAP (Picture:Getty Images) An extraordinary congress will be called to elect a new president, Blatter said. As part of Fifas work, the organisation will re-examine the way in which it is structured. While it would be premature to speculate on the outcomes of this work, nothing will be off the table, including the structure and composition of the Executive Committee and the way in which members of the Executive Committee are elected The governing body said there is significant work to be done in order to regain the trust of the public and to fundamentally reform the way in which people see Fifa. 4. Could England host the 2018 World Cup? (Picture:Markus Gilliar Pool/Getty Images) A question hangs over who should host the 2018 World Cup. Lennart Johansson, the former head of Uefa,previouslyclaimed that England should host the World Cup instead of Russia and, amid the corruption crisis, anything is possible. 5. Beginning of the end (Picture: Fox) Blatters decision marks the beginning of the end of his 17-year reign as Fifa president, with much of it now tainted by investigations into the organisations conduct, specifically regarding the awarding of the 2018 and 2022 World Cups to Russia and Qatar respectively. Fifa is likely to undergo substantial reform following the announcement, with United States Attorney General Loretta Lynch stating last week that the recent arrests of several senior officials suggest that the corruption in the organisation is rampant, systemic and deep-rooted.

Article.title: The country with the lowest birth rate in the world might surprise you
Article.Description: Britain is ranked at 152 out of 208 countries.
Article.MainBody: Amy Willis for Metro.co.uk Tuesday 2 Jun 2015 5:33 pm Source: World Bank The number of babies being born in Germany isofficially the lowest in the world. Thats according to recent birth rate figures by the World Bank showing how just 8.28 babies are born per 1,000 people at the moment. Britains birth rate meanwhile is ranked at 152nd out of 208 countries at 12.68 babies per 1,000. The higher birth rate in the UK is believed to be dueto immigration, with foreign mothers giving birth keeping figures buoyant. Germany has also experienced similar migration, but the birth rate has remained low indicating that foreign mothers there are adopting the national habit of having fewer children later in life. This does not appear to be the case in Britain. Elsewhere, Niger has the highest birth rate in the world with 49.93 births per 1,000 and Mali a close second with 47.54 births.

Article.title: Cinnamon might just be the world’s happiest dog
Article.Description: 'She's such a big baby. She makes it known that she wants to be coddled 24/7.'
Article.MainBody: Harry Readhead for Metro.co.uk Tuesday 2 Jun 2015 4:20 pm Surely the worlds happiest dog? (Picture: Caters) It seems this dogjust cant stop smiling. 11-year-old Cinnamon the Shiba has been called the worlds happiest dog because ofher unrelentingear-to-ear grin. According to owners Andrew and Ashley, they cant go anywhere with her without being stopped in the street by passers-by. Andrew and Ashley say Cinnamon gets a lot of attention (Picture: Caters) The amount of attention Cinnamon gets is overwhelming, 28-year-old Andrew, an entertainment attorney, told MailOnline . Everyone stops us, commenting on her grin. Andrew and Ashley, 27, said Cinnamon loves nothing more than spending time with the pair. When were sat watching TV, shell cry on the other side of the room until one of us picks her up and puts her in between us and rub her belly, said Andrew, who got Cinnamon in 2004 when was six months old. Andrew, a lawyer, calls the Shiba a big baby (Picture: Caters) Shes such a big baby. She makes it known that she wants to be coddled 24/7. Though Cinnamonsuffers from glaucoma and Cushings disease, nothing seems to make her unhappy except being left alone. And shes even set to be her owners flower girl when they get married on 4 June.

Article.title: Woman mauled by a lion recorded her own death on camera
Article.Description: The animal pounced seconds after she took its photo.
Article.MainBody: Nicole Morley for Metro.co.uk Tuesday 2 Jun 2015 2:30 pm Turns out big cats dont like having their photo taken (Picture: Gauteng) A woman who ignored warning signs andleft her window open during a safari may have recorded her own death on camera. The as-yet unnamed American tourist in her 30s was pounced on bya lioness through the open window. Police are now investigating 22imagesleft on the camera. One of the parks tour guides is recovering in hospital with severe injuries after he attempted to prise the woman from the lions jaws. Scott Simpson, Lion Parks operations manager said: The dead ladys camera was taken by police as evidence. The lion pounced through an open window (Picture: Gauteng) Witnesses say that both front windows were down the whole time they were in the enclosure. This latest incident is the third big cat attack at the Gauteng safari park in South Africa in just four months. Park officials claim they tell guests to wind up their windows but are often ignored. More

Article.title: Here’s the official 11-year time lapse of World Trade Center’s construction
Article.Description: At 1,298ft, the One World Trade Center is the tallest building in the western hemisphere.
Article.MainBody: Ollie McAteer for Metro.co.uk Tuesday 2 Jun 2015 1:39 pm The official 11 year time-lapse video of One World Trade Center is absolutely breath-taking. The incredible footage was released to celebrate the opening of One World Observatory in New York City. It shows hundreds of thousands of high definition images captured from October 2004 to Memorial Day in May 2015. The observation deckison the 100th to 102nd floors of the tower.At 1,298ft, the One World Trade Center is the tallest building in the western hemisphere and the fourth tallest in the world.

Article.title: This is the secret to being rich, according to one economist
Article.Description: That's being rich, not getting rich...
Article.MainBody: Harry Readhead for Metro.co.uk Tuesday 2 Jun 2015 1:19 pm Simply being born in Germany is enough to make you richer than the majority of people in China and India(Picture: Getty Images) If you type how into Google, the thirdoption is how to make money. Unsurprisingly, getting rich isa goal for a huge number of people. But in a global context, many of these same people are already rich and one economist claims to know why. According to Branko Milanovic, wealth isnt so much about who your parents are as where you were born. His research found that even if you are in the bottom 1 percent in Germany in terms of wealth, youre still richer than 90 percent of those in India and all but the top 40 percent of people in China. MORE: Have any of these old gadgets? Theyre worth a lot of money now Mr. Milanovic factored in the differingpurchasing power of different countries (Picture: Branko Milanovic) In fact, more than half of what you earn is determined by the country in which you live, but since only 3 percent of the worlds population are immigrants, your wealth is effectivelydetermined by the country in which you were born. For instance, if you work in McDonalds in India, youll make 30p an hour. In China, 53p an hour, in Russia, 1.54 an hour and in the US, 4.81 an hour. In Western Europe, youll make, on average, 6.19 an hour. Of course, local goods and services are more expensive in Western Europe than in India. But even with this taken into account as Mr. Milanovic does by using thepurchasing power parity (PPP) metric the difference in wealth is huge. MORE: Brits who change their route to work are likely to earn more money Branko Milanovic specialises in global income inequality (Picture: Getty Images) Being rich, then in a global sense, anyway is as simple as living in the right place. But how do yougetrich? Matt OBrien, writing for the Washington Post , suggests that if those in poorer countries wishto become wealthier, the obvious solution is to move to richer countries. Relocatingto wealthier countries allows immigrantsto earn more doing the same job that they were doing anyway. However, Mr. OBrien hastens to add that large-scaleimmigration would inevitably drive down wages for the people already living in thatcountry at least in the short-to-medium run.

Article.title: STOP EVERYTHING: Kim Jong Un is still wearing his new hat
Article.Description: He looks somewhere inbetween a Shoreditch hipster and a banjo-playing yokel.
Article.MainBody: Nicholas Reilly for Metro.co.uk Tuesday 2 Jun 2015 12:49 pm Looking good? (Picture: AFP/Getty Images) A few days ago, we revealed the earth shattering news that Kim Jong-Un had a new hat. He had opted for what appears to be a straw trilby looking somewhere in between a Shoreditch hipster and a banjo-playing yokel. But either way, the hat seemed to cover his blockhead hairstyle and it seems that he isnt planning on abandoning the headgear anytime soon. He was seen wearing it outside this big pink palace. Strike a pose, Kimmy. (Picture: EPA/Rodong Sinmun) Decided to still rock it as he visited a factory (Picture: REUTERS/KCNA) Took a glimpse of rural life in North Korea Man of the people? (Picture: Reuters) And looked exceptionally happy as he visited a new nursery for the dear children of North Korea. Uncle Kim visits the nursery (Picture: EPA/Rodong Sinmun)

Article.title: Watching wild animals look at their reflections is excellent Tuesday viewing
Article.Description: For these animals, the sudden appearance of another member of their species can prompt an odd reaction.
Article.MainBody: Harry Readhead for Metro.co.uk Tuesday 2 Jun 2015 11:30 am It has been well-documented that only highly-intelligentanimals, such as elephants, some great apes, magpies and humans, can recognise themselves in the mirror. Good for them. For other animals who dont recognise their reflections, however, the sudden, mysterious appearance of another of their speciescanprompt a strong reaction. MORE: Seven of the weirdest things animals do while having sex How much do you bench? (Picture: YouTube/Caters TV) French photographer Xavier Hubert Brierre travelled with his wife to Gabon, where the pair set up a large mirror in several locations and recorded the animals that came by. First, aleopard tries tokiss itsreflection and then a gorilla tries to kill its reflection. By contrast, its clear that the chimpanzees and the elephant recognise themselves. The elephant in particular looks genuinely bored as itlumbers past. MORE: A prankster has livened up a pet store by creating labels for imaginary animals Honestly, what are you doing? (Picture: YouTube/Caters TV) The best reactions, we think, come from thebirdand thebaboon,however. The former hurtles straight into the mirror while the latter sees itsreflection and literally jumps out of the way in fear. YouTube users seem to disagree. One, calling themselves NimbleBlood, links to the part of the video where Mr. Brierre is cleaning the mirror. Funniest animal yet, he writes. If you enjoyed that video, here are some more animals struggling to understandmirrors: More

Article.title: Motorcyclist tells driver to stop texting, driver responds by knocking him off his bike
Article.Description: Drive hard with a vengeance.
Article.MainBody: Nicole Morley for Metro.co.uk Tuesday 2 Jun 2015 11:20 am Motorcyclist Samuel Ayres asked a driver to put down his phone while waiting at a traffic light. The driver obviously didnt take to kindly to his request, so decided to pursue Ayres and knock him off his bike in a potentially fatal revenge attempt. Capturing the incident on a camera fastened to his helmet, Ayres said the journey started as a fairly typical commute. But Ayres ended up sustaining injuries so serious hes had to set up a crowdfunding site to cover medical costs. He said: On March 26, 2015, I was driving to work on my motorcycle. I noticed one man in a black BMW convertible. He was very busy texting and talking on his mobile phone. Road rage revenge (Picture: YouTube) He became visibly angry when I yelled at him to put down his phone. Once the light turned green, I proceeded through the intersection. The BMW driver came flying up behind me very aggressively. Describing the shocking attack, Ayres added: After a couple of blocks, he swerved into my lane, knocking both my bike and myself to the ground. The clip then shows the driver speed away from the scene without stopping. MORE: Can cyclists and drivers ever co-exist peacefully? The smash left Ayres with a concussion so severe he couldnt remember what year it was when he came round. He also suffered two hairline fractures in his left shoulder and a broken left foot, but because the driver is currently under criminal investigation, Ayres cannot claim compensation. His crowdfunding site has currently raised $1,717.

Article.title: Homeless guy drops some serious truth bombs about society
Article.Description: 'The hard part wasn't going to prison it was getting out, and trying to be part of society again.'
Article.MainBody: Oliver Wheaton for Metro.co.uk Tuesday 2 Jun 2015 10:43 am Warning: Videocontainsstrong language and profound wisdom Sometimes you have to lose everything in life to realise what its all really worth. Tyler Mann recently sat down to have a conversation with a homeless man he saw outside a petrol station in Austin, Texas and had what might be one of the most profound conversations of his life. In a sobering monologue the articulate mantook Tyler through his personal story, including his cushty life before prison, his drug conviction, and his life on the street. Occasionally wiping a tear away from his eye, he ponders on why humanity has become so scared of each other, recounting the time when he asked a woman for the time only to be shouted at. MORE: Heres what its like to take LSD The unnamed man speaks the truth (Picture: Tyler Mann/Youtube) MORE: Abercrombie & Fitch lose court battle after telling Muslim woman her headscarf didnt fit their look policy The maneven has roughly 240 friends on Facebook (butnobody reached out when he asked them to call him on Christmas Day). However one thing that only the video can convey is the anguish in the mans voice as delivers his views on the world. More

Article.title: Hundreds trapped after Chinese cruise ship capsizes with 458 people on board
Article.Description: Eastern Star was carrying 458 people.
Article.MainBody: Harry Readhead for Metro.co.uk Tuesday 2 Jun 2015 10:35 am At least five people are dead and hundreds more are trapped after a cruise ship capsized on Chinas Yangtze River. Eastern Star, which was carrying 458 people,was reportedly caught in a cyclone and sent no emergency signal as the hull was turned over and the boat began to sink. Passengers, most of whom were Chinese tourists aged between 50 and 80, swam to shore and raised the alarm. MORE: Cruise ship with 2,500 passengers runs aground near Bermuda Triangle At least five people are dead (Picture: AP) Rescuerssaid that at least five people are dead and hundreds more are still trapped aboardEastern Star. The captain and chief engineer both survived and have been detained. State media quotes the pair as saying that the vessel sank within minutes, while many of those on board were asleep. The ship, which was travelling from eastern city of Nanjing to Chongqing in the south-west, sank in the Damazhou waterway, BBC reports , where the river bed is around 15m below the surface. The ship was reportedly caught in a cyclone (Picture: AP) More

Article.title: Abercrombie & Fitch lose court battle after telling Muslim woman her headscarf didn’t fit their ‘look policy’
Article.Description: The clothing brand said her hijab didn't fit with the store's 'look policy'.
Article.MainBody: Follow us Abercrombie & Fitch lose court battle after telling Muslim woman her headscarf didnt fit their lookpolicy Oliver Wheaton for Metro.co.uk Tuesday 2 Jun 2015 10:04 am Samantha Elauf was told her hijab did not fit with the stores look policy (Picture:REUTERS/Jim Bourg/Files) A Muslim womanwho was denied a job at Abercrombie & Fitch because she wears a headscarf has won a legal battle to sue them for discrimination. Samantha Elauf, 24, wasturned down for a job atAbercrombie Kids in Oklahoma when she was 17 because her religious attire did not fit in with the companys look policy. However the Supreme Court hasruled that the decision was a form of religious discrimination in the landmark case. The case was brought to the Supreme Court byU.S. Equal Employment Opportunity Commission (EEOC), the federal agency that sued the company on Elaufs behalf after she was turned down for the role in 2008. Elauf, now 24, initially won a $20,000 judgement against Abercrombie before a federal district court, however the 10th U.S. Circuit Court of Appeals in Denver then threw that out, ruling in favour of Abercrombie, before the high court backed Elauf.

Article.title: Newspaper editor resigns after publishing Kama Sutra sex scene
Article.Description: Editor in chief Jaber al-Harmi wrote: 'All apologies are not enough for such a serious mistake.'
Article.MainBody: Ollie McAteer for Metro.co.uk Monday 1 Jun 2015 10:01 pm (Picture: Getty) The editor of a daily newspaper in Qatar has resigned after inadvertently running part of the Kama Sutra. The photograph, which appeared inAl-Sharq, showed a womans henna tattoo which depicted scenes from the ancient sex book. It was carried alongside an article into the dangers of henna. Editor in chief Jaber al-Harmi wrote: All apologies are not enough for such a serious mistake, which occurred by publishing morally inappropriate images. Our values and principles provide a red line that cannot be breached and so I presented my resignation to the board. This tragic incident revealed to us the extent of the adherence of our community to religion, values and morals.

Article.title: Au Revoir! Workmen in Paris have started removing the padlocks from the bridge of love
Article.Description: The 19th century bridge has become a shrine for tourists who seek to immortalise their love
Article.MainBody: Nicholas Reilly for Metro.co.uk Monday 1 Jun 2015 8:45 pm Au Revoir! (Picture: Chesnot/Getty Images) Dry your eyes, clichd romantics because workmen in Paris have now begun removing the thousands of padlocks attached to the Pont des Arts Bridge, out of fear that the sheer weight of the romantic gesture could cause it to collapse. The 19th century bridge has become a shrine for tourists who seek to immortalise their love by following thousands of other couples like sheep and adding a padlock to the bridges railings. Its the end of the padlocks, deputy Paris mayor Bruno Julliard said. They spoil the aesthetics of the bridge, are structurally bad for it and can cause accidents, he correctly explained. The decision to remove the locks was taken after one section of railing collapsed, causing a potential risk to shipping on the River Seine below. The railings will be replaced with panels covered in street art, and later by Plexiglass. And dont come back! (Picture: AP Photo/Remy de la Mauviniere) Left up to us, the locks would be destroyed in a fiery furnace, but sympathetic authorities will recycle the metal so that the symbol of love which these couples have invested in them will not be lost entirely. And a no-nonsense attitude will be taken towards reckless romantics who instead decide to place the locks on other Paris landmarks including the Eiffel Tower.

Article.title: Family dog bakes to death after groomers leave it in heated drying cage for too long
Article.Description: Two-year-old Colby died of heat stroke.
Article.MainBody: Ollie McAteer for Metro.co.uk Monday 1 Jun 2015 8:33 pm Colby died of heat stroke (Picture: Facebook) A family claim their dog was baked to death while at a groomers. Two-year-old Colby is believed to have been left in a heated drying cage for too long duringhis appointment at Petco in Westchester Commons, Virginia, US. Allison Marks, from Powhatan, said she dropped off her pet and picked him up a few hours later to be told he was dead. She told WTVR: He was my shadow. He followed me everywhere.He was my next soul mate. Hes been going there since he was a puppy. Staff are reported to have cried with the owner (Picture: Getty) Ms Marks was toldher dog had died of heat stroke and Petco staff are reported to have cried with her. Petcosaid in a statement: The health and safety of pets is always our top priority and we take full responsibility for all animals under our care. We are taking immediate action to investigate and understand the situation. Our thoughts are with Colbys family at this difficult time.

Article.title: Lion kills woman at wildlife park after biting her through window
Article.Description: She'd rolled down the window to take photos.
Article.MainBody: Jimmy Nsubuga for Metro.co.uk Monday 1 Jun 2015 7:09 pm A lioness at the Lion Park where a woman was killed today (Picture: barcroftindia.com) A lion has killed a woman and injured a man whowere driving through a private wildlife park. The attack occurred at around 2:30pm in Johannesburg, South Africa, when a lioness approached the passenger side of avehicle as the woman took photos. They had their windows all the way down, which is strictly against policy, said Scott Simpson, assistant operations manager at the Lion Park. He added: The lion bit the lady through the window. MORE: Man jailed for spiking someones Jagermeister The driver tried to punch the lion but was scratched by the animal before park staff quickly chasedit away and called an ambulance. Unfortunately, she did pass away, said Mr Simpson, adding the US Embassy had been informed because the woman was American. The Lion Park is a popular destination for tourists who can drive in their own vehicles through large enclosures where lions roam freely. Big signs advise visitors to keep their car windows up and drivers entering the park are also handed a paper with the same warning.

Article.title: How on Earth did the driver survive this crash?
Article.Description: The driver suffered serious injuries and is recovering in hospital.
Article.MainBody: Ollie McAteer for Metro.co.uk Monday 1 Jun 2015 7:05 pm Its got to be one of the most dramatic car crashes ever caught on camera. CCTV in Toronto, Canada, captured the moment a motorist smashes through a fence, flies over cars and collides with the wall of a vehiclerepair shop. The driver suffered serious injuries and is recovering in hospital. It is not known what caused the crash, but CTV reports the car was seen travelling at speed out of a petrol station. The owner of the car repair shop told CTV: The car went airborne, missing the cars that were parked and went through the building clean, and was stopped by a structural beam.

Article.title: Gay teen raped by his own mother to ‘cure’ homosexual tendencies
Article.Description: Misguided parents are taking extreme measures to ensure their children are straight.
Article.MainBody: Nicole Morley for Metro.co.uk Monday 1 Jun 2015 6:26 pm (Picture: Getty) A gay teen has been forced to have sex with his own mum in a bid to cure his sexual preferences. Gay rights group LGBT Collective, who operate from Telangana in southern India, warn that parents are so desperate to have heterosexual children that so-called corrective rapes are being inflicted on gay adolescents by members of their own family. Relatives often cousins, but in some cases parents force themselves on victims in a misguided attempt to ensure they are cured of homosexuality. One teenage boy suspected of being gay was forced to have sex with his own mother. MORE: Westboro Baptist Church fail spectacularly at Irish gay marriage protest The organisation said it hasreceived at least 15 reports of corrective rapes in the last five years, but believe some victims keep quiet because of the trauma and shame associated with sexual assault and homosexuality in the country. LGBT Collective spokesperson, Vyjayanti Mogli said: We are sure there are many more cases, but they go unreported. We came across such cases not because they reported the rape, but because they sought help to flee their homes, Mogli told the Times of India. Its usually a cousin whos roped in for this project. Mogli also described a string of cases in the south in which newborn girls are promised to a cousin for marriage, if she is later discovered to be in a lesbian relationship family elders oftenarrange for the intended spouse to carry out a forcible cure attempt. In 2013 the Indian Supreme Court reinstated a colonial law which banned gay sex, which means homosexuality can be punished with up to tenyears in jail.

Article.title: Have any of these old gadgets? They’re worth a lot of money now
Article.Description: Thanks, hipsters.
Article.MainBody: Ollie McAteer for Metro.co.uk Monday 1 Jun 2015 6:05 pm *Ventures into loft* (Picture: Getty) Thanks, hipsters. Your never-endingquest for niche has resulted in a price surgeof vintage gadgets. Quick, rummage through your storage and dig out any of the below you could be hoarding some serious cash, according toEndsleigh Insurance which collected its data from eBay. And learn from the mistakes of this woman , who threw out an Apple 1 computer worth 130,000. 1. Nokia 3310 200 (Picture: Getty) SNAKE. Forget the dawn of text messaging it was all about Snake.Now the iconic phone has reached the giddy heights of more than200 on many auction sites. 2. Gamecube 1,000 (Picture: Getty) The Gamecube was only around for sixsweet years, but this short-lived console is now worth a grand. Game of choice: Super Smash Bros Melee. 3. Dreamcast 800 (Picture: Getty) Theconsule keeps on giving. Dreamcasts popularity hasnt dwindled since its launch in 1999. 4. First Generation iPod 9,793 (Picture: Getty) WHOA!? This jaw-droppingly large price-tag is for all those first gennies still in their original packaging. If youve opened it (because you wanted to use it or something stupid) then its worth around 650. 5. Sony Walkman Cassette 200 (Picture: Getty) The humble cassette player has had a hipster resurgence, and you can snap up one of these vintage delights fora couple of hundy. Nice. And if youve still got one of those Sony Walkman CD players then you could get 390. 6. Nintendo 64 1,316 (Picture: Getty) Remember when you spent hours playing James Bond on Big Head mode and your mother warned youd amount to nothing? Prove her wrong by making nearly 1,500 from this bad boy. 7. Boombox Ghettoblaster 1,447
